against_all_odds.name: Against All Odds
against_all_odds.desc: For each combat tag you have on your character, increase your damage by 1% (max of 7%).

emergency_reserves.name: Emergency Reserves
emergency_reserves.desc: When you get hit below 20% health, gain 20% tempo immediately (3 minute CD).

unswayed.name: Unswayed
unswayed.desc: The effects of Taunt and Encore no longer work on you.

steady_footing.name: Steady Footing
steady_footing.desc: You're much more resistant to being pushed around. You don't slide on ice.

kick_off.name: Kick Off
kick_off.desc: You easily brush off shorter falls, taking no damage. Your first wall jump will always send you higher than normal. Gain a speed boost after wall jumping over a wall.

time_to_go.name: Time To Go
time_to_go.desc: Taking a life grants a speed boost for 10 seconds. Taking a player's life doubles the speed boost and the duration.

an_ironsingers_instinct.name: An Ironsinger's Instinct
an_ironsingers_instinct.desc: Successfully dodging an attack coats you in metal and reduces the damage of the next attack damage taken. 18s CD.

exposed_durability.name: Exposed Durability
exposed_durability.desc: Deal +10% damage to opponents with no armor durability left.

phantom_edge.name: Phantom Edge
phantom_edge.desc: Your weapon Basic Attacks have +0.25 range.

perfect_flash.name: Perfect Flash
perfect_flash.desc: Having over 95% health causes your mantras to do +25% more damage. This damage bonus will scale down to 10% if your enemies are far away.

neural_overload.name: Neural Overload
neural_overload.desc: You can input up to 4 copies of each Mantra ingredient instead of being limited to 3.

everchanging_aegis.name: Everchanging Aegis
everchanging_aegis.desc: You take 20% less damage from attacks the same element as the last element you were hit with, but 10% more damage from attacks from different elements.

overflowing_dam.name: Overflowing Dam
overflowing_dam.desc:
Having full Ether for 2 seconds or more grants an aura to your attacks that grants them 5%-10% more damage.
[*The percentage of gained damage scales with your Intelligence between 0 INT and 40 INT.]

wyverns_claw_lht.name: Wyvern's Claw [LHT]
wyverns_claw_lht.desc: You deal 10% more damage while airborne. Mantras receive a 5% bonus to damage instead.

wyverns_claw_med.name: Wyvern's Claw [MED]
wyverns_claw_med.desc: You deal 10% more damage while airborne. Mantras receive a 5% bonus to damage instead.

wyverns_claw_hvy.name: Wyvern's Claw [HVY]
wyverns_claw_hvy.desc: You deal 10% more damage while airborne. Mantras receive a 5% bonus to damage instead.

aeronade.name: Aeronade
aeronade.desc: Your trap automatically detonates on contact with an object.

vacuum_punch.name: Vacuum Punch
vacuum_punch.desc: Your Gale Punch pulls enemies in before you hit them.

gale_trap.name: Gale Trap
gale_trap.desc: Knocking a player tags them with a wind trap, cause anyone to pick up that body to get sent flying. However, if you pick up the body you gain the speed boost for 20 seconds.

stifled_jump.name: Stifled Jump
stifled_jump.desc: Enemies who jump while suffocated by you are dazed.

suffocating_impact.name: Suffocating Impact
suffocating_impact.desc: When flourishing enemies into walls they are suffocated and winded for a short duration.

aerogliding.name: Aerogliding
aerogliding.desc: When falling from a high place, hold spacebar to generate wind currents until you hit the floor. Also gives you more airtime with Gliders.

wild_alchemy.name: Wild Alchemy
wild_alchemy.desc: You have a chance to brew 2 potions instead of 1.

potion_quaffer_ftd.name: Potion Quaffer [FTD]
potion_quaffer_ftd.desc: You're accustomed to drinking toxic fluids quickly. You'll get along famously with the other patrons at the tavern. Drinking potions slows you down less and grants superior regenerative effects to you.

potion_quaffer_wil.name: Potion Quaffer [WIL]
potion_quaffer_wil.desc: You're accustomed to drinking toxic fluids quickly. You'll get along famously with the other patrons at the tavern. Drinking potions slows you down less and grants superior regenerative effects to you.

chain_reaction.name: Chain Reaction
chain_reaction.desc: When applying a potion effect to someone who already has one, the new effect is amplified. You have a 25% chance not to deplete potions when drinking them.

placebo_effect.name: Placebo Effect
placebo_effect.desc: Drinking potions near allies will share the potion's effect with them.

apothecary.name: Apothecary
apothecary.desc: Potions you prepare will have amplified positive effects when consumed, and amplified negative effects when thrown.

chemists_bag.name: Chemist's Bag
chemists_bag.desc: You no longer drop Potions on death.

approaching_singularity.name: Approaching Singularity
approaching_singularity.desc: You now gain +1% Mantra PEN for every 10 points of Intelligence.

scaredy_cat.name: Scaredy Cat
scaredy_cat.desc: When enemies initiate a fight with you, gain a speed boost.

conditioned_runner.name: Conditioned Runner
conditioned_runner.desc: You regenerate health faster than normal when sprinting below 75% HP. The health amount scales with your agility stat.

endurance_runner.name: Endurance Runner
endurance_runner.desc: Even when things look dire, you still have it in you to keep your legs moving.

flame_within.name: Flame Within
flame_within.desc: An application of Pleeksty's concept of the inner flame, also known as the soul of man. Set yourself ablaze to gain 10% extra damage and 10% extra speed.

hook,_line,_and_sinker.name: Hook, Line, and Sinker
hook,_line,_and_sinker.desc: Once something's caught your line, it's much harder to get loose.

fishers_lure.name: Fisher's Lure
fishers_lure.desc: Fish are drawn to your line more quickly.

proficient_baiting.name: Proficient Baiting
proficient_baiting.desc: Casting your line excites ocean life, reducing the chances of fishing up trash.

collapsed_lung.name: Collapsed Lung
collapsed_lung.desc: Block breaking an opponent closes off their ability to Vent for 8s, with this duration scaling with Strength.

carnivore.name: Carnivore
carnivore.desc: In return for losing the ability to eat vegetation, sate your hunger by gripping monsters and people alike.

sunken_predator.name: Sunken Predator
sunken_predator.desc: Enemies you hit in the water or the depths have their speed buffs nullified and are slowed.

grand_feast.name: Grand Feast
grand_feast.desc: Regain ether, tempo, blood, and health from killing.

devastating_power.name: Devastating Power
devastating_power.desc: Gain extra Ether for every Mantra in your arsenal.

arc_module_guard.name: Arc Module: Guard
arc_module_guard.desc: Blocking with your Arc Suit active negates all backstabs and allows you to block attacks from behind.

arc_module_dash.name: Arc Module: Dash
arc_module_dash.desc: When Arc Suit is active, your dashes become Jet dashes allowing you to attack while dashing.

arc_module_eject.name: Arc Module: Eject
arc_module_eject.desc: When block broken with Arc Suit active, eject from the armor.

oath_arcwarder.name: Oath: Arcwarder
oath_arcwarder.desc: You vow to be a shield for your comrades, to wear your regalia with pride and serve the greater collective. From each according to their ability, to each according to their needs.

arc_module_null.name: Arc Module: Null
arc_module_null.desc: When your Arc suit is active, outgoing and incoming enchant effects are nullified.

arc_module_leap.name: Arc Module: Leap
arc_module_leap.desc: Holding Spacebar after double jumping propels you up for a short duration.

master_craftsman.name: Master Craftsman
master_craftsman.desc: Your skills alone substitute the need for a Craft Station.

deep_wound.name: Deep Wound
deep_wound.desc: Assassinating a target applies anti-heal for 20s and gives you a speed boost for 3s. Assassination damage now scales with level against mobs.

lowstride.name: Lowstride
lowstride.desc: When crouching, your stealth and roll distance are increased. The speed penalty you receive from crouching is much smaller. You now draw and sheathe your weapon silently.

unseen_threat.name: Unseen Threat
unseen_threat.desc: You can assassinate those with weapons out provided you're not in combat yourself. Those you assassinate are slowed and unable to jump for 5s.

lights_out.name: Lights Out
lights_out.desc: Assassinations now give you 30% PEN and blind the target for 5s. Those you carry are now blindfolded.

riot_breaker.name: Riot Breaker
riot_breaker.desc: You receive 15% less posture damage and deal 10% more posture damage when under attack by 3 or more enemies.

authority_intimidation.name: Authority Intimidation
authority_intimidation.desc: Lightning moves slow your opponent more.

second_interrogation.name: Second Interrogation
second_interrogation.desc: Opponents who are electrified do 50% less damage to you and do 50% less posture damage to you.

resolve_crusher.name: Resolve Crusher
resolve_crusher.desc: Lightning moves now apply stacks of 'Resolve Crusher'. At 4 stacks, you apply 'Electrified' to your opponent. Attacks from Electrified opponents are converted into Lightning damage, but will deal 10% less damage to you.

first_interrogation.name: First Interrogation
first_interrogation.desc: Attacks from opponents who are Electrified will give you Ether proportional to their initial damage.

reinforced_armor.name: Reinforced Armor
reinforced_armor.desc:
Incoming PEN is reduced by 30%.
[Note: Scales with investment. Having less Fortitude reduces the effect of this Talent, with a minimum of 10%.]
reinforced_armor.reqs: battle_tendency, braced_collapse, perseverance, moving_fortress => reinforced_armor := 90s FTD

braced_collapse.name: Braced Collapse
braced_collapse.desc: After being block broken, the next attack to hit you deals reduced damage.

perseverance.name: Perseverance
perseverance.desc: When you're knocked down, you get back up again more quickly.

battle_tendency.name: Battle Tendency
battle_tendency.desc: You can breathe more easily with +20% faster posture regen.

moving_fortress.name: Moving Fortress
moving_fortress.desc: Blocking no longer slows you down as much.

armored_plating.name: Armored Plating
armored_plating.desc: Put on extra plating on your armor, giving you 50 temporary health whenever you are put in combat. Due to the weight of this additional plating, you have reduced speed at all times.

steel_tread.name: Steel Tread
steel_tread.desc: Gain a bit of knockback resistance as well as damage resistence against attacks that ragdoll you.

crossguard.name: Crossguard
crossguard.desc: If you are using a sword, you gain 10% chip against other opponents using swords.

oppressive_force.name: Oppressive Force
oppressive_force.desc:
When using a weapon found in the Merit Armoury, gain a unique two-hit flourish that does not knock back opponents and dazes them. Second hit only procs if the first hit.
[*Note: The second hit deals 80% of your weapon's scaled damage and cannot be damage modified otherwise.]

riot_shield.name: Riot Shield
riot_shield.desc: While you are fighting two or more opponents and are using a shield, reduce the total amount of chip damage you take by 40%.

berserk.name: Berserk
berserk.desc: One with nothing to lose has everything to gain. Succumb to the burning rage within, nullifying your own armor in exchange for nullifying the armor of your foes on your Basic Attacks. Grants your Criticals +10% PEN while active.

float_like_a_butterfly.name: Float Like a Butterfly
float_like_a_butterfly.desc: In a display of true strength, cancel your air dash to enter a frenzy of slashes. (5s CD)

soaring_storm.name: Soaring Storm
soaring_storm.desc: Empower your uppercuts with the way of the blade, after Lithe Stepping, flourishing, or landing an oath ability.

oath_bladeharper.name: Oath: Bladeharper
oath_bladeharper.desc: You vow to carry your blades as an instrument, to lend yourself to any cause it guides you to. Collapse the infinite number of possibilities ahead of you into just one. The blade keeps you as much as you keep it.

untouchable.name: Untouchable
untouchable.desc: By landing consecutive hits on your opponent without taking any damage, reveal your true strength for a short duration.

lithe_step.name: Lithe Step
lithe_step.desc: When sprinting, roll-cancel and instantly vanish and surge with unmatched speed.

reveal.name: Reveal
reveal.desc: Pour your heart out and reveal your true strength

anchor_shock.name: Anchor Shock
anchor_shock.desc: Your Blightshock prevents targets from using mobility mantras.

sovereign_state.name: Sovereign State
sovereign_state.desc: Landing physical hits builds your Blight Meter. At full gauge, enter a Blight State that changes your critical and empowers Blightsurge abilities.

blightpierce.name: Blightpierce
blightpierce.desc: Your Blightshock attacks pierce through your enemies hyperarmor and gain more penetration.

blighted_touch.name: Blighted Touch
blighted_touch.desc: Landing Basic Attacks during Sovereign State now applies Blightshock.

oath_blightsurger.name: Oath: Blightsurger
oath_blightsurger.desc:
Fists and storm. Wield sacred lightning, tear through foes and leave them withered.
[*Note; the requirements for this Oath is 80 additive Body (so 30 Strength, 20 Fortitude, and 30 Agility works!]
oath_blightsurger.reqs: oath_blightsurger := 80r STR OR 80r FTD OR 80r AGL, 40s LTN, 40s WND

oath_blindseer.name: Oath: Blindseer
oath_blindseer.desc: You vow to not let the horrors of the world pierce your tightly fastened blindfold. Everything is simply as we choose to perceive it.

all-seeing_eye.name: All-Seeing Eye
all-seeing_eye.desc: The mystic eye through which you now see the world can perceive the imperceptible. Invisible foes are highlighted.

smell_of_blood.name: Smell of Blood
smell_of_blood.desc:
When people touch a blood pool, briefly see their blood and blood poison.
[*Note: This Talent does proc on guardbreaks.]

bloodwardens_sense.name: Bloodwarden's Sense
bloodwardens_sense.desc: Enemies you attack with a mantra above 60% Blood Poisoning are highlighted briefly.

bloodrend_unbounded.name: Bloodrend Unbounded
bloodrend_unbounded.desc:
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your bloodrend to its fullest.
[Note: Falling below 75 Bloodrend revokes this Talent.]

bloodrender.name: Bloodrender
bloodrender.desc: Gain the ability to command Blood as a Bloodrender. Your Bloodrend mantras replenish blood, steal blood, and apply 'Blood Poisoning'.

sheltering_grasp.name: Sheltering Grasp
sheltering_grasp.desc: Blood mantras cast within blood pools have a reduced blood cost.

crimson_fountain.name: Crimson Fountain
crimson_fountain.desc: Blockbreaking or flourishing an enemy now spills a pool of blood below them.

expert_bloodrender.name: Expert Bloodrender
expert_bloodrender.desc: You can now obtain 2-star Bloodrender mantras.

hemorrhaging_blow.name: Hemorrhaging Blow
hemorrhaging_blow.desc: Block breaking your opponent with a blood mantra turns your opponent's combat healing into damage for 8 seconds (55 second CD)

rush_hour.name: Rush Hour
rush_hour.desc: Stab yourself to become stronger, faster, and deal increased blood bar damage.

first_blood.name: First Blood
first_blood.desc: Your first blood mantra you use in combat has no blood cost.

adept_bloodrender.name: Adept Bloodrender
adept_bloodrender.desc: You can now obtain 1-star Bloodrender mantras.

sanguine_siphon.name: Sanguine Siphon
sanguine_siphon.desc: Landing a critical attack while in a blood pool will consume that pool and empower your next blood mantra.

master_bloodrender.name: Master Bloodrender
master_bloodrender.desc: You can now obtain 3-star Bloodrender mantras. Your maximum blood capacity is 25% more than a normal individual. You regen blood at a quicker pace.

cold_blooded.name: Cold Blooded
cold_blooded.desc: Chilled enemies passively build up blood poision, alternatively when crystals explode it'll apply blood poison. (DOES NOT STACK)

malevolent_sapper.name: Malevolent Sapper
malevolent_sapper.desc: The more blood poisoning your opponent has, the more ether your shadow mantras steal from your opponent.

scorchblood.name: Scorchblood
scorchblood.desc: Guardbreaking your opponent with a bloodrend mantra causes a blood explosion, setting your opponent on fire and poisoning their blood.

brain_death.name: Brain Death
brain_death.desc: Enemies that are already suffocated will have their suffocation extended when hit by a Bloodrend mantra.

blood_and_iron.name: Blood and Iron
blood_and_iron.desc: Pulling rods out of your opponent now replenishes an equivalent amount of blood.

electrolyte.name: Electrolyte
electrolyte.desc: Hitting Bloodrend mantras while having temporary health applies Shocked while removing a portion of temporary health.

bruisers_mixup.name: Bruiser's Mixup
bruisers_mixup.desc: Switching your fight Style mid-fight makes your basic Fist attack inflict bleed temporarily.

impairing_blow.name: Impairing Blow
impairing_blow.desc: [Greataxe] Basic attacks will slightly slow your enemy for 2s. Running attacks will slightly slow for 3s. Gain +20% posture damage against enemies with speed boosts

heavy_fatigue.name: Heavy Fatigue
heavy_fatigue.desc: [Greataxe] Hitting an enemy slowed by your Greataxe temporarily reduces how far they can roll.

brazen_blow.name: Brazen Blow
brazen_blow.desc: [Greataxe] Attacking an enemy slowed by your Greataxe grants you temporary hyperarmor. 20s CD.

rending_impact.name: Rending Impact
rending_impact.desc: [Greataxe] Block breaking an enemy applies an extended knockdown.

defensive_reprisal.name: Defensive Reprisal
defensive_reprisal.desc:
Being flourished grants you 10% posture resistance for up to 20s.
[*Note: 12s to 20s duration between 20 and 65 Fortitude.]

knuckle_guard.name: Knuckle Guard
knuckle_guard.desc:
Hitting Dazed enemies grants you 10% posture resistance for up to 15s.
[*Note: 10s to 15s duration between 30 and 80 Strength + Fortitude.]

down_to_your_level.name: Down to your Level
down_to_your_level.desc:
While you have a speed debuff, your Basic Attacks slow your enemies for up to 5s.
[*Note: 3s to 5s duration between 20 and 60 Fortitude.]

dancing_guard.name: Dancing Guard
dancing_guard.desc:
Parrying an opponent and then parrying another enemy in quick succession applies slow for up to 7s.
[*Note: 4s to 7s duration between 20 and 55 Fortitude.]

swift_rebound.name: Swift Rebound
swift_rebound.desc: Move faster after successfully dodging an attack.

evasive_expert.name: Evasive Expert
evasive_expert.desc: Your speed boost granted from dodging is increased.

risky_moves.name: Risky Moves
risky_moves.desc: When you successfully dodge, you'll automatically dodge the next attack.

ghost.name: Ghost
ghost.desc:
Dodging a move will briefly make you invisible, ending early if you attack.
[*Note: 0.8s to 1.2s duration between 10 and 40 Agility.]

perpetual_wrath.name: Perpetual Wrath
perpetual_wrath.desc: Unleash the true power of Restrain. Each successive hit will increase its damage.

chainlash.name: Chainlash
chainlash.desc: On flourish, whip your chain to seize and yank enemies towards you, setting them up for a crushing kick.

oath_chainwarden.name: Oath: Chainwarden
oath_chainwarden.desc: You vow to be the chain that binds the wicked and drags them back where they belong. There are those in this world who should not be free.

defiance.name: Defiance
defiance.desc: Negative status effects are half as effective when you are below 35% HP.

champions_regalia.name: Champion's Regalia
champions_regalia.desc: Flourishing an opponent grants you 1.5x posture damage for 10 seconds.

underdog.name: Underdog
underdog.desc: You deal 2.5% more damage to those with higher HP than you, scaling up to 4% at 60 WLL. Additionally, you deal +10% more damage to physically larger foes.

dazing_finisher.name: Dazing Finisher
dazing_finisher.desc:
Flourishing enemies that are charmed by you causes them to not be knocked back and be dazed instead.
[*This talent loses some effect below its investment cost.]
dazing_finisher.reqs: charismatic_cast, tough_love, chaotic_charm, lasting_charisma => dazing_finisher := 55s CHA

chaotic_charm.name: Chaotic Charm
chaotic_charm.desc:
Charm enemies nearby when attacked at low health. Enemies affected by this charm have their damage increased to anyone but you, and deal reduce damage towards you.
[*This Talent scales on your Charisma investment.]

tough_love.name: Tough Love
tough_love.desc: Deal 10% more damage to enemies charmed by you. Mantras deal 5% instead. Being hit by someone the same Aspect or Oath as you charms them briefly.

charismatic_cast.name: Charismatic Cast
charismatic_cast.desc: Landing a hit with a mantra on an enemy applies Charmed, reducing their damage done to you. Allies recover from being knocked twice as quickly when charmed by you.

lasting_charisma.name: Lasting Charisma
lasting_charisma.desc:
Enemies charmed by your mantras are charmed for longer.
[*Scales by -0.275 seconds per Charisma invested point between 10s-15s.

freezing_wight.name: Freezing Wight
freezing_wight.desc: Your Haunted Gale now procs Chilled.

unstoppable_force.name: Unstoppable Force
unstoppable_force.desc: [Greathammer] You take 15% less posture damage when parried.

destructive_recovery.name: Destructive Recovery
destructive_recovery.desc: [Greatsword] Enemies recover 20% less Posture when parrying.

heavy_hitter.name: Heavy Hitter
heavy_hitter.desc: [Heavy Weapons] Your Basic Attack posture damage is increased by 10%.

lords_tithe.name: Lord's Tithe
lords_tithe.desc: Everyone you Reinforce is drained of their Ether while Reinforced. Drain scales with your Shadowcast.

grand_support.name: Grand Support
grand_support.desc: Everyone you buff with Reinforce is healed lightly. You're healed slightly if you heal others.

hidden_tendril.name: Hidden Tendril
hidden_tendril.desc: Landing any physical mantra or critical places a hidden tendril on the opponent.

oath_contractor.name: Oath: Contractor
oath_contractor.desc: Your heart is forever now eternally tied to Zi'eer, the 4th Prophet of the Ministry. You swear to serve under his will, no matter the cost.

string_trick.name: String Trick
string_trick.desc: Pulls together any two opponents you've attached Hidden Tendrils to.

pressure_detonation.name: Pressure Detonation
pressure_detonation.desc: Block breaking an opponent with a Shadow mantra generates a small vacuum that suffocates those hit and steals their Tempo.

decisive_blow.name: Decisive Blow
decisive_blow.desc: Hitting an enemy with your Critical Attack immediately after they dodge (or any time against mobs) now procs Knife's Journey. Your Knife's Journey procs do 2x Armor damage.

finishing_touch.name: Finishing Touch
finishing_touch.desc: [Daggers] Instantly execute enemies finished with the critical attack of your dagger.

knifes_journey.name: Knife's Journey
knifes_journey.desc: Cancelling an enemy's Mantra windup with your basic attack now deals 15% more damage.

successive_throw.name: Successive Throw
successive_throw.desc: [Dagger] When you successfully flourish an enemy, you throw out a dagger afterwards.

chilling_flourish.name: Chilling Flourish
chilling_flourish.desc: When flourishing an enemy, they leave behind a trail of ice in the direction you send them.

fragile_freeze.name: Fragile Freeze
fragile_freeze.desc: Your Light Attacks and Critical will now freeze chilled opponents on guardbreak.

spike_traps.name: Spike Traps
spike_traps.desc: Press [F] during the wind up of your Ice Spikes to create traps around you instead of spawning a spike in the normal spot.

condensation_drip.name: Condensation Drip
condensation_drip.desc: Passively collect condensation from the air, greatly reducing your thirst.

preceding_chill.name: Preceding Chill
preceding_chill.desc: Enemies hit during the last moments of your ice beam are frozen.

cool_head.name: Cool Head
cool_head.desc: If set on fire while on ice, immediately put it out and gain the Cool Head status for 30s. During Cool Head, you cannot be lit on fire. 15s cooldown.

golden_age.name: Golden Age
golden_age.desc: Your Iron Pull now detonates Crystals and overloads Surges.

in_a_hurry.name: In a Hurry
in_a_hurry.desc: Grip players faster whenever you have a speed boost active.

muffled_screams.name: Muffled Screams
muffled_screams.desc: You quieten the cries of help of those you execute, reducing the distance at which their allies will hear it and come to assist, and reduce the effectiveness of talents that slow your execution.

blood_thirsty.name: Blood Thirsty
blood_thirsty.desc: Gain a speed boost after causing an opponent heavy blood loss.

dark_waltz_med.name: Dark Waltz [MED]
dark_waltz_med.desc: Anytime you guardbreak your opponent with a light attack or critical, steal half of your opponent's current tempo.

dark_waltz_lht.name: Dark Waltz [LHT]
dark_waltz_lht.desc: Anytime you guardbreak your opponent with a light attack or critical, steal half of your opponent's current tempo.

dark_replenishment.name: Dark Replenishment
dark_replenishment.desc: Knocking out an enemy in combat restores a portion of your ether.

dark_waltz_hvy.name: Dark Waltz [HVY]
dark_waltz_hvy.desc: Anytime you guardbreak your opponent with a light attack or critical, steal half of your opponent's current tempo.

dark_hours.name: Dark Hours
dark_hours.desc: Your Shadowcast Mantras deal 15% more damage at night and in realms the Sun does not reach.

dark_rift.name: Dark Rift
dark_rift.desc: Enter a rifted state when you sucessfully dodge, where you can't be damaged until its duration ends. Can be cancelled early if you attack.

shadow_overflow.name: Shadow Overflow
shadow_overflow.desc: Extra ether stolen with mantras are exerted as dark energy, damaging and absorbing ether from those nearby.

blighted_song.name: Blighted Song
blighted_song.desc: Attaching your Shadow Chains to enemies disables both your and your enemy's ability to cast mantras. You take reduced damage from non-chained enemies while this is applied.

night_terror_med.name: Night Terror [MED]
night_terror_med.desc: Your light attacks and criticals now proc Fear the Dark.

dark_synergy.name: Dark Synergy
dark_synergy.desc: Engulf your enemy in shadows when flourishing them.

night_terror_lht.name: Night Terror [LHT]
night_terror_lht.desc: Your light attacks and criticals now proc Fear the Dark.

overwhelming_drain.name: Overwhelming Drain
overwhelming_drain.desc: If multiple enemies are hit by your Shadow Eruption, they are dazed.

night_terror_hvy.name: Night Terror [HVY]
night_terror_hvy.desc: Your light attacks and criticals now proc Fear the Dark.

dark_god.name: Dark God
dark_god.desc: If a Shadowcast mantra would drain your opponent's Ether to 0, drain from their Tempo instead and increase your Tempo. Shadowcast mantras will now raise your tempo if your ether is full.

oath_dawnwalker.name: Oath: Dawnwalker
oath_dawnwalker.desc: You vow to forever reach towards the brilliant Light. There is no shadow that your radiance cannot expunge.

luminous_flash.name: Luminous Flash
luminous_flash.desc: After dealing a certain amount of damage while in 'Absolute Radiance', gain a chance to empower your strikes with pure light.

protagonist_syndrome.name: Protagonist Syndrome
protagonist_syndrome.desc: The grasp of shadow is meaningless in the face of your blinding light. Your Dawnwalker mantras are empowered after being hit by Shadowcast.

absolute_radiance.name: Absolute Radiance
absolute_radiance.desc: Dealing damage with Dawnwalker mantras briefly makes you immune to all elemental status effects for a short duration.

blackhole.name: Blackhole
blackhole.desc: Your singularity pulls everyone nearby in.

energy_siphon.name: Energy Siphon
energy_siphon.desc: Your singularity now pulls ether from the extra players affected by Blackhole.

spell_shout.name: Spell Shout
spell_shout.desc: You now will shout the names of your spells upon cast.

depths_connection.name: Depths Connection
depths_connection.desc: Your interaction with The Depths allows you to easily draw ether from the surrounding air.

frozen_web.name: Frozen Web
frozen_web.desc: Landing a critical with a Static Link on your opponent applies Chilled.

officers_training.name: Officer's Training
officers_training.desc: While using a sword or rapier, take 30% less posture damage from Critical Attacks.

target_focus.name: Target Focus
target_focus.desc: Enemies you charm take more damage from your squadmates in your party.

buster_call.name: Buster Call
buster_call.desc:
Radio in the Authority's navy for a buster call, sending out a barrage of bombardment wherever you see fit. 1d CD.
[*Note: Applies burn on hit, doesn't knock players.]

ethirons_gaze.name: Ethiron's Gaze
ethirons_gaze.desc: Your eyes have been opened to the wasteland. You can now see through the harsh fog of the storm of the Eternal Gale more clearly now.

concussive_flash.name: Concussive Flash
concussive_flash.desc: Your blinding light now concusses foes.

strong_stern.name: Strong Stern
strong_stern.desc: The duration you are dazed from wall bangs is cut in half.

tap_dancer.name: Tap Dancer
tap_dancer.desc: Rolling immediately after a roll-cancel no longer puts your roll on a longer cooldown.

steady_nerves.name: Steady Nerves
steady_nerves.desc: You dance from toe to toe - successful dodges restore posture.

concussion.name: Concussion
concussion.desc: Enemies you flourish into walls have their vision altered for a short duration and are dazed longer than usual.

strong_hold.name: Strong Hold
strong_hold.desc: [Medium Weapons] When above half health and two-handling, posture damage taken is reduced by 5%.

concussive_force.name: Concussive Force
concussive_force.desc: Enemies you knocked remain downed longer than usual.

spine_cutter.name: Spine Cutter
spine_cutter.desc: Hitting an enemy in the back after a roll cancel will initiate a second slash that deals your weapon's raw damage.

precise_swing.name: Precise Swing
precise_swing.desc: After landing a critical your next basic attack will have +25% chip damage.

nullifying_clarity.name: Nullifying Clarity
nullifying_clarity.desc: Deal 10% more damage to enemies with status effects on them with your basic attacks but the effect is removed on impact.

charged_return.name: Charged Return
charged_return.desc: Being under an elemental status effect causes your Basic Attacks and critical attacks to do 10% more damage.

give_and_take.name: Give and Take
give_and_take.desc:
Deal less damage to comrades and receive less damage from comrades.
[*Note: 20% less damage to and from allies.]

cornered_fool.name: Cornered Fool
cornered_fool.desc:
Blockbreaking a Charmed opponent procs Taunt for a scaled duration, making them take and deal more damage. 15s CD.
[*Note: 3 seconds at 0 Charisma, 6 seconds at 85 Charisma.]

off_your_game.name: Off Your Game
off_your_game.desc: You now slow Taunted enemies when you hit them.

robber_baron.name: Robber Baron
robber_baron.desc: You hold onto more of your items when defeated.

mantra_permanence.name: Mantra Permanence
mantra_permanence.desc: Knocking an enemy with a mantra refunds the cost of the mantra.

eureka.name: Eureka
eureka.desc: Gain a stack of Inspiration every time you land or parry a Mantra. Whiffing a Mantra removes a stack of inspiration. Reaching 3 stacks grants +10% Mantra Damage to your next Mantra attack

ether_absorption.name: Ether Absorption
ether_absorption.desc: Receive Ether back when inflicted with damage from Mantras.

keen_recovery.name: Keen Recovery
keen_recovery.desc: Landing a basic attack after feinting a mantra will restore the feinted mantra's ether cost.

unwavering_focus.name: Unwavering Focus
unwavering_focus.desc: When your mantras are parried, receive less posture (scales with intelligence).

reverse_leech.name: Reverse Leech
reverse_leech.desc: Anytime you proc Behind You, steal ether from your opponent too.

behind_you.name: Behind You
behind_you.desc: Landing a basic attack behind your enemy after feinting a mantra will apply an ether slash, dealing extra damage based on how much ether you have left.

hair_products.name: Hair Products
hair_products.desc: Select Hair Products to apply to others with your Hair Spray.

barbers_skillset.name: Barber's Skillset
barbers_skillset.desc: What type of look are we going for today?

oath_fadetrimmer.name: Oath: Fadetrimmer
oath_fadetrimmer.desc: You vow to forever hone your precision with the scissors. There will never be another fringe incident again.

phoenix_impact.name: Phoenix Impact
phoenix_impact.desc: If you Meteor Slam an opponent while you're on Fire, restore some HP and Ether.

meteor_impact.name: Meteor Impact
meteor_impact.desc: Aerial moves will follow up into a devastating slam.

ferrymans_curse.name: Ferryman's Curse
ferrymans_curse.desc: You have a 20% chance to convert incoming elemental damage into Lightning damage.

fishman.name: Fishman
fishman.desc: You can execute enemies in water. Gain additional healing from knocking others in water.

the_final_act.name: The Final Act
the_final_act.desc: Landing a fire mantra immediately after flourishing an opponent will cause them to explode.

dancing_steps.name: Dancing Steps
dancing_steps.desc: Fire mantras now move you in the direction you're facing.

graceful_steps.name: Graceful Steps
graceful_steps.desc: Your dancing steps now gives a faster speed boost.

hells_partisan_warding.name: Hell's Partisan [WARDING]
hells_partisan_warding.desc: After landing a flame dagger on an opponent, your next hit against them will impale with a divine spear from above.

cauterized_wounds.name: Cauterized Wounds
cauterized_wounds.desc: Blood loss from all sources is lowered.

warding_radiance.name: Warding Radiance
warding_radiance.desc: Every fire mantra builds up one halo stack. At 3 stacks a halo appears that allows you to slide further. Hell's Partisan is also triggered passively while this is active.

hells_partisan_fire_forge.name: Hell's Partisan [FIRE FORGE]
hells_partisan_fire_forge.desc: After landing a flame dagger on an opponent, your next hit against them will impale with a divine spear from above.

flamewalker.name: Flamewalker
flamewalker.desc: When Warding Radiance is active you leave trails of flame when you slide.

flamecharm_unbounded.name: Flamecharm Unbounded
flamecharm_unbounded.desc:
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your flamecharm to its fullest.
[Note: Falling below 75 Flamecharm revokes this Talent.]

expert_flamecharmer.name: Expert Flamecharmer
expert_flamecharmer.desc: You can now obtain 2-star Flamecharmer Mantras.

adept_flamecharmer.name: Adept Flamecharmer
adept_flamecharmer.desc: You can now obtain 1-star Flamecharmer Mantras.

flamecharmer.name: Flamecharmer
flamecharmer.desc: Grants you the ability to command Fire as a Flamecharmer.

unyielding_inferno.name: Unyielding Inferno
unyielding_inferno.desc: Your flames burn just as strong even in the fiercest of storms.

intrepid_flame.name: Intrepid Flame
intrepid_flame.desc: Flames wear off twice as fast on you.

produce_spark.name: Produce Spark
produce_spark.desc: A simple production of flame for the use of making campfires.

master_flamecharmer.name: Master Flamecharmer
master_flamecharmer.desc: You can now obtain 3-star Flamecharmer mantras.

azure_flames.name: Azure Flames
azure_flames.desc: Many of your flames turn blue, signifying their increased intensity.

temperature_shock.name: Temperature Shock
temperature_shock.desc: Your fire mantras now detonate any stacked crystals.

agility_unbounded.name: Agility Unbounded
agility_unbounded.desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your agility to its fullest.

hunters_reflexes.name: Hunter's Reflexes
hunters_reflexes.desc: You have a slightly larger dodge window.

to_the_finish.name: To The Finish
to_the_finish.desc:
You take up to 10% less damage when below 30% health.
[*Note: -5%-10% between 20 and 50 Fortitude.]

exoskeleton.name: Exoskeleton
exoskeleton.desc:
You have a layer of fortified Natural Armor that replenishes when you rest. Your Natural Armor will resist 10% of Physical Damage while active.
[*Note: +5%-+10% between 0 and 40 Fortitude.]

glacial_mobility.name: Glacial Mobility
glacial_mobility.desc: Cast Ice Blade while slide-jumping to perform a special running attack.

glacial_finish.name: Glacial Finish
glacial_finish.desc: Press [F] while using your Ice Smash Mantra to follow up with a devastating attack.

frostdraw_unbounded.name: Frostdraw Unbounded
frostdraw_unbounded.desc:
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your frostdraw to its fullest.
[Note: Falling below 75 Frostdraw revokes this Talent.]

adept_frostdrawer.name: Adept Frostdrawer
adept_frostdrawer.desc: You can now obtain 1-star Frostdrawer mantras.

cold_front.name: Cold Front
cold_front.desc: Your Vent is imbued with glacial frost.

expert_frostdrawer.name: Expert Frostdrawer
expert_frostdrawer.desc: You can now obtain 2-star Frostdrawer mantras.

master_frostdrawer.name: Master Frostdrawer
master_frostdrawer.desc: You can now obtain 3-star Frostdrawer mantras.

frostdrawer.name: Frostdrawer
frostdrawer.desc: Grants you the ability to command Ice as a Frostdrawer.

orbital_ice.name: Orbital Ice
orbital_ice.desc: When landing a parry while standing on ice, automatically form a ring of ice that grants 15% Physical Resistance. The ring will break after sustaining a certain amount of damage, scaling with your Frostdraw.

glacial_coasting.name: Glacial Coasting
glacial_coasting.desc: Sliding while Orbital Ice is active leaves trails of ice.

fulgurite_formation.name: Fulgurite Formation
fulgurite_formation.desc: When your Crystals explode, lightning strikes. When your Surge charges Overload on an enemy, your Crystals apply twice on them for 8s.

frozen_legs.name: Frozen Legs
frozen_legs.desc: Your slow effect prevents opponents from rolling.

tempest_wind.name: Tempest Wind
tempest_wind.desc: Cast Wind Blade while sliding to unleash a quick whirlwind attack.

imperium_kata.name: Imperium Kata
imperium_kata.desc: Wield an advanced form of the Legion's martial arts.

legion_kata.name: Legion Kata
legion_kata.desc: Gain the ability to use the Legion's martial arts.

galebreathe_unbounded.name: Galebreathe Unbounded
galebreathe_unbounded.desc:
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your galebreathe to its fullest.
[Note: Falling below 75 Galebreathe revokes this Talent.]

expert_galebreather.name: Expert Galebreather
expert_galebreather.desc: You can now obtain 2-star Galebreather mantras.

galebreather.name: Galebreather
galebreather.desc: Grants you the ability to command Wind as a Galebreather

adept_galebreather.name: Adept Galebreather
adept_galebreather.desc: You can now obtain 1-star Galebreather mantras.

master_galebreather.name: Master Galebreather
master_galebreather.desc: You can now obtain 3-star Galebreather mantras.

inhale.name: Inhale
inhale.desc: Cancelling a wind spell stores its power in your lungs for 5 seconds, empowering the next wind spell cast in that time. All relevant modifications and upgrades from the inhaled wind mantra are applied to the empowered mantra. Inhaling a spell will cause the wind to be applied to your Basic Attacks.

breathing_impact.name: Breathing Impact
breathing_impact.desc: Knocking enemies into objects with wind spells deals additional blunt damage based on how hard they're hit.

after_cut.name: After Cut
after_cut.desc: If an attack is physical and wind it will apply an after cut that does 10% of the damage you dealt. If the attack was a mantra, it does 5% damage instead.

neuroplasticity.name: Neuroplasticity
neuroplasticity.desc: Your mind is a pliable, flexible substance. The Ether cost of additional modifications to your Mantra is now reduced by 20%.
neuroplasticity.reqs: neuroplasticity := 35r INT OR 35r WLL OR 35r CHA

crystal_shrapnel.name: Crystal Shrapnel
crystal_shrapnel.desc: Your Crystal explosions now have an AoE that applies crystals to all hit.

glass_path_crystallization.name: Glass Path: Crystallization
glass_path_crystallization.desc: Your Ice abilities no longer grant a slow effect or the ability to freeze and instead cause ice crystals to grow on your opponent.

reclaimed_glass.name: Reclaimed Glass
reclaimed_glass.desc: Your crystal shrapnel explosions now grant you and any allies caught in them for 10% Elemental Resistance for 10s.

legendary.name: Legendary
legendary.desc: Parrying and landing hits with your weapon gives you ether back.

fortitude_unbounded.name: Fortitude Unbounded
fortitude_unbounded.desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your fortitude to its fullest.

parting_gift.name: Parting Gift
parting_gift.desc: After you land a flourish, gain the ability to shoot bullets for 5 seconds. [Dual Gun]

bulletproof_med.name: Bulletproof [MED]
bulletproof_med.desc: You take no Armor damage from guns. You take 5% less Armor damage from other sources.

hip_shooter_hvy.name: Hip Shooter [HVY]
hip_shooter_hvy.desc: When wielded with a Medium/Heavy weapon, your side gun can now fire a bullet projectile. 5s CD

hip_shooter_med.name: Hip Shooter [MED]
hip_shooter_med.desc: When wielded with a Medium/Heavy weapon, your side gun can now fire a bullet projectile. 5s CD

prime_ether_bullets.name: Prime Ether Bullets
prime_ether_bullets.desc: Your bullets take one less hit to proc elemental effects and now have slight intelligence scaling.

armor_piercing_lht.name: Armor Piercing [LHT]
armor_piercing_lht.desc: [Guns] Your gun attacks now ignore 10% of an opponent's physical armor. Applied multiplicatively before PEN is applied.

armor_piercing_med.name: Armor Piercing [MED]
armor_piercing_med.desc: [Guns] Your gun attacks now ignore 10% of an opponent's physical armor. Applied multiplicatively before PEN is applied.

bulletproof_ftd.name: Bulletproof [FTD]
bulletproof_ftd.desc: You take no Armor damage from guns. You take 5% less Armor damage from other sources.

true_ether_bullets_lht.name: True Ether Bullets [LHT]
true_ether_bullets_lht.desc: Using Ether Bullets applies elemental damage of your highest investment.

true_ether_bullets_med.name: True Ether Bullets [MED]
true_ether_bullets_med.desc: Using Ether Bullets applies elemental damage of your highest investment.

quickdraw.name: Quickdraw
quickdraw.desc: Allows you to fire your offhand gun right after swinging. [Not necessary on dual guns]

bulletproof_lht.name: Bulletproof [LHT]
bulletproof_lht.desc: You take no Armor damage from guns. You take 5% less Armor damage from other sources.

brain_rattler.name: Brain Rattler
brain_rattler.desc: [Clubs] Guardbreaking an opponent with your Critical rattles their brain in its container, causing increased blood loss and blurring their vision.

hammerfall.name: Hammerfall
hammerfall.desc: [Clubs] Aerial attacks do 25% more posture damage when blocked.

dispatch.name: Dispatch
dispatch.desc: [Clubs] Bear Trapped targets deal 20% less posture. Dazed targets deal 20% less posture. This can stack.

fan_the_flames.name: Fan the Flames
fan_the_flames.desc:
Your stored Wind mantras can now empower your Fire mantras.
[Note: Some Flamecharm Mantras negatively scale with size! Looking at you, Fire Eruption.]

all_above,_gods_below.name: All Above, Gods Below
all_above,_gods_below.desc: Any healing your opponent were to receive while All the Dead Gods is active on them is stolen and given to you.

sin_stacker.name: Sin Stacker
sin_stacker.desc: Your All the Dead Gods' duration is now based on how many stacks of antiheal you already have on your opponent.

heretics_sutra.name: Heretic's Sutra
heretics_sutra.desc:
A chant that steers you into the state of insanity for 20 seconds.
[*Note: Procs Piercing Will for 15 seconds.]
[*Note: 0.4s to 0.1s wind-up and 24s to 18s cooldown between 30 and 100 Willpower.]

all_the_dead_gods.name: All the Dead Gods
all_the_dead_gods.desc:
Your Basic Attacks now apply anti-heal for 8s.
[Note: Scales with investment. Having less Willpower reduces the effect of this Talent.]

mythic_stability.name: Mythic Stability
mythic_stability.desc: Players and regular mobs cannot instantly execute you while you're on your feet. Protects you from one instance of instant execution while knocked. 60s CD.

not_a_scratch.name: Not A Scratch
not_a_scratch.desc: You don't show any signs of damage.

brick_wall.name: Brick Wall
brick_wall.desc:
You refuse. You cannot be knocked off your feet until you are knocked completely unconscious. You are also now knocked down for less time.
[*Note: Knockdown reduction scales with your Fortitude and Willpower.]

peripheral_vision.name: Peripheral Vision
peripheral_vision.desc: Your glare now ignores if your opponent is facing you.

frozen_pin-cushion.name: Frozen Pin-Cushion
frozen_pin-cushion.desc: Hitting an opponent with your Ice Daggers causes them to freeze.

cryonis.name: Cryonis
cryonis.desc: All ice spells casted on top of ice cost less Ether.

frostbite.name: Frostbite
frostbite.desc: Enemies can no longer heal when under the effect of your chill.

frozen_anchor_hvy.name: Frozen Anchor [HVY]
frozen_anchor_hvy.desc: Apply bottom freeze and chill to your opponent whenever you land a flourish, uppercut, or crit. 10s CD.

stasis_strike_med.name: Stasis Strike [MED]
stasis_strike_med.desc: Your crystal explosions deal more damage whenever your opponent is also bottom frozen.

frozen_anchor_lht.name: Frozen Anchor [LHT]
frozen_anchor_lht.desc: Apply bottom freeze and chill to your opponent whenever you land a flourish, uppercut, or crit. 10s CD.

saint_jay.name: Saint Jay
saint_jay.desc: When a Chilled enemy receives a heal, it's nullified and 60% of the healing is redirected to you. While this is active and they are on ice your rate of healing is increased.

unyielding_frost.name: Unyielding Frost
unyielding_frost.desc: Your Chill can proc through block, with blocked Chilling proc lasting 80% of the duration.

bottom_freeze.name: Bottom Freeze
bottom_freeze.desc: Hitting chilled enemies with ice projectiles while they are on ice freezes them to the ground.

stasis_strike_lht.name: Stasis Strike [LHT]
stasis_strike_lht.desc: Your crystal explosions deal more damage whenever your opponent is also bottom frozen.

stasis_strike_hvy.name: Stasis Strike [HVY]
stasis_strike_hvy.desc: Your crystal explosions deal more damage whenever your opponent is also bottom frozen.

frozen_anchor_med.name: Frozen Anchor [MED]
frozen_anchor_med.desc: Apply bottom freeze and chill to your opponent whenever you land a flourish, uppercut, or crit. 10s CD.

frost_buster.name: Frost Buster
frost_buster.desc: Greatsword and Greathammer criticals now place Ice underneath the path they carve.

union_pager.name: Union Pager
union_pager.desc: Check up on job listings remotely.

union_hook.name: Union Hook
union_hook.desc: You can now make use of the Ignition Union hooks to ascend or descend.

force_your_way.name: Force Your Way
force_your_way.desc: You can parry uparryable attacks from giant monsters, at the cost of armor durability.

immolation.name: Immolation
immolation.desc: Fire spells cost 70% less while on fire. If you hit someone while on fire, apply fire damage. You take 50% less damage from self-inflicted flames.

phoenix_flames.name: Phoenix Flames
phoenix_flames.desc:
Any time you would burn to death, you instead rise again with up to 50% of your health restored. Has a 60 second cooldown.
[*The health returned with this talent scales on your Flamecharm investment, starting at 25%.]

agitating_spark.name: Agitating Spark
agitating_spark.desc: Setting enemies on fire spreads to anyone nearby. Including yourself.

pleekstys_faith.name: Pleeksty's Faith
pleekstys_faith.desc: When on fire, automatically quench flames at the cost of some ether.

corpse_explosion.name: Corpse Explosion
corpse_explosion.desc: Bodies that burn to death immediately explode dealing massive damage. Your fires will incinerate unconscious targets much faster.

chitin.name: Chitin
chitin.desc: You have a layer of Natural Armor that replenishes when you rest.

nightchild.name: Nightchild
nightchild.desc: Relying on your instincts, you are naturally more stealthy. You are more nimble on wooden surfaces

mark_of_nemit.name: Mark of Nemit
mark_of_nemit.desc: Buffs the food of one person they choose around them as long as they are at a campfire

loyalty.name: Loyalty
loyalty.desc: Your bond with your allies is strong enough to reduce damage between you

seaborne.name: Seaborne
seaborne.desc: You have a keen understanding of ships and their maintenance.

union_card.name: Union Card
union_card.desc: A card representing your membership in the Ignition Union. Entitles you to speedier experience gain from Dungeons and Jobs, though the fees slightly reduce your experience gain outside of these.

deepfolk.name: Deepfolk
deepfolk.desc: The secrets of the Deep are easier for you to unravel. Your mind is sturdier against its effects

mothwing_dust.name: Mothwing Dust
mothwing_dust.desc: You release Mothwing Dust when others are the first to strike, granting you vision of your attacker. Your antennae improve your peripheral senses, narrowing the angle at which you can be backstabbed.

deepbound_contract.name: Deepbound Contract
deepbound_contract.desc: You progress much faster in the Depths, and slower on the overworld. You can regain sanity at Castle Light, but will always face the strongest foes in your Trial.

mark_of_jurik.name: Mark of Jurik
mark_of_jurik.desc: Buffs the sanity of one person they choose around them as long as they are at a campfire

maudet.name: Maudet
maudet.desc: Your understanding of your destiny is such that learning new things often comes naturally to you. People appreciate your diplomatic ways of speaking

voidwalker_contract.name: Voidwalker Contract
voidwalker_contract.desc: You progress much faster from completing bounties, and less from events. Gain access to the Voidheart, and factions have a negative outlook on you.

versatile.name: Versatile
versatile.desc: You learn how to use new pieces of equipment quicker than others. You can equip things at 3 points lower than the requirement

navaes_guidance.name: Navae's Guidance
navaes_guidance.desc: Navae's star guides your path, showing you the way forward. Right-clicking on maps sets a Waymarker which can be followed. You are less prone to starvation.

feathered_glider.name: Feathered Glider
feathered_glider.desc: As a show of independance when they come of age, Tirans will strike out on their own with just their hand-crafted glider, gliding down from the mountains peaks where they make their homes. You take 10% less fall damage.

molt.name: Molt
molt.desc: Ailments and blessings alike fade away more quickly

echolocator.name: Echolocator
echolocator.desc: Your highly tuned hearing helps you navigate, seeing better in the dark and sensing potential threats.

mark_of_ku.name: Mark of Ku
mark_of_ku.desc: Buffs the rest of one person they choose around them as long as they are at a campfire

flanking_maneuvers.name: Flanking Maneuvers
flanking_maneuvers.desc: Enemies you assassinate take more PEN from your squadmates in your party.

executioners_frenzy.name: Executioner's Frenzy
executioners_frenzy.desc: Landing a light attack while an opponent's posture is paused reduces their assassination cooldown by 5 seconds.

fatal_stealth.name: Fatal Stealth
fatal_stealth.desc:
You deal increased backstab damage to opponents based on how high your stealth stat currently is.
[*Note: +0.2% damage per 1 Stealth from Equipment.]

stature_break.name: Stature Break
stature_break.desc: Landing a backstab of any kind disables posture for 8 seconds.

backstabber.name: Backstabber
backstabber.desc: Landing a backhit with a light attack causes you to grab your opponent and stab them again, dealing an extra 15 damage.

tacet_minimization.name: Tacet Minimization
tacet_minimization.desc: Focus your Tacet even further, allowing the radius at which you get spotted to become smaller temporarily.

critical_engine_med.name: Critical Engine [MED]
critical_engine_med.desc: You gain the ability to use Deep Gems on your critical attack. Hold out the Deep Gem you wish to apply to your crit and then use the tool to enhance your critical.

critical_engine_hvy.name: Critical Engine [HVY]
critical_engine_hvy.desc: You gain the ability to use Deep Gems on your critical attack. Hold out the Deep Gem you wish to apply to your crit and then use the tool to enhance your critical.

critical_engine_lht.name: Critical Engine [LHT]
critical_engine_lht.desc: You gain the ability to use Deep Gems on your critical attack. Hold out the Deep Gem you wish to apply to your crit and then use the tool to enhance your critical.

willpower_unbounded.name: Willpower Unbounded
willpower_unbounded.desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your willpower to its fullest.

ironsing_unbounded.name: Ironsing Unbounded
ironsing_unbounded.desc:
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your ironsing to its fullest.
[Note: Falling below 75 Ironsing revokes this Talent.]

thornmail.name: Thornmail
thornmail.desc: Getting flourished applies a metal rod to the attacker.

master_ironsinger.name: Master Ironsinger
master_ironsinger.desc: You can now obtain 3-star Ironsinger mantras.

heavy_shoulders.name: Heavy Shoulders
heavy_shoulders.desc: If your opponent has 3 or more rods, their dodges are slower.

oh_the_irony.name: Oh The Irony
oh_the_irony.desc: Opponents affected by 'Taunt' receive double iron rods for the duration.

laced_traps.name: Laced Traps
laced_traps.desc: People hit by your 'Caltrops' cannot jump and are slowed for a small duration.

ironclad_punishment.name: Ironclad Punishment
ironclad_punishment.desc: Your Ironsing mantras deal more posture damage to enemies the more armor durability they have.

alloyblood.name: Alloyblood
alloyblood.desc:
You  don't bleed like others do. Bleed damage is reduced by 30%. Blood loss is reduced by 75%.
[Note: Scales with investment. Having less Ironsing reduces the effect of this Talent.]

adept_ironsinger.name: Adept Ironsinger
adept_ironsinger.desc: You can now obtain 1-star Ironsinger mantras.

piercing_metal.name: Piercing Metal
piercing_metal.desc: Deal additional armor damage to enemies per metal rod affecting them

ironsinger.name: Ironsinger
ironsinger.desc: Grants you the ability to command Metal as an Ironsinger. Press X to pull on Metal Rods.

metal_shackles.name: Metal Shackles
metal_shackles.desc: Guardbreaking an opponent prevents them from receiving speed boosts for 5 seconds.

expert_ironsinger.name: Expert Ironsinger
expert_ironsinger.desc: You can now obtain 2-star Ironsinger mantras.

serpents_dance.name: Serpent's Dance
serpents_dance.desc: Unleash the power of Fang and Coil and unlock a devastating Running Critical Attack,, feint to cancel momentum.

grand_skewer.name: Grand Skewer
grand_skewer.desc: Press [F] during the windup of Grand Javelin to activate. Your Grand Javelin now carries opponents through the air.

oath_jetstriker.name: Oath: Jetstriker
oath_jetstriker.desc: You vow to flow with the Song itself, drifting across where the trails may take you. If the song permeates everything, then let it be your conduit, and you its master.

decisive_winds.name: Decisive Winds
decisive_winds.desc: When damaged below 50% health, gain maximum sprint momentum temporarily, then this ability is put on cooldown.

jetstream_pursuit.name: Jetstream Pursuit
jetstream_pursuit.desc: Upon a succesful flourish. teleport to the opponent when they stop moving. Receive a significant boost of momentum.

stratos_step.name: Stratos Step
stratos_step.desc: Holding space while climbing will now let you perform Stratos Steps to get even higher. Others can follow your Stratos Steps.

acceleration_points.name: Acceleration Points
acceleration_points.desc: Striking an opponent in the back with mobility mantras or basic attacks now steals and grants additional momentum.

rush_of_ancients.name: Rush of Ancients
rush_of_ancients.desc: Dashing at maximum sprint momentum makes you one with the wind itself.

amplified_reflexes.name: Amplified Reflexes
amplified_reflexes.desc: Amped now grants enhanced speed and parkour, but triples the self-damage on use and doubles its cooldown.

amplified_rage.name: Amplified Rage
amplified_rage.desc: Amped now grants you an additional +10% weapon damage.

electrify.name: Electrify
electrify.desc: Shock yourself and apply Amped for 15s. Can be used while Carried to escape.

the_path,_unveiled.name: The Path, Unveiled
the_path,_unveiled.desc: Your Jus Karita attacks deal 15% more damage.

swiftkick_prodigy.name: Swiftkick Prodigy
swiftkick_prodigy.desc: Hitting successive basic attacks with Jus Karita will give you a temporary speed buff.

jus_karita.name: Jus Karita
jus_karita.desc: Adopt the kick-based fighting style of the Justicars.

justicars_prowess.name: Justicar's Prowess
justicars_prowess.desc: Jus Karita +30% posture damage against other fist styles.

flying_swiftkick.name: Flying Swiftkick
flying_swiftkick.desc: Hitting a Jus Karita critical attack while Swiftkick Prodigy is active will greatly slow your enemy and consume your speed boost.

justicars_renewal.name: Justicar's Renewal
justicars_renewal.desc: Hitting an opponent with your Jus Karita critical resets the cooldown. (10s cooldown)

kickstart_cha.name: Kickstart [CHA]
kickstart_cha.desc: Play the resurrector. Use your lightning to defibrillate your allies on the battlefield.

kickstart_ftd.name: Kickstart [FTD]
kickstart_ftd.desc: Play the resurrector. Use your lightning to defibrillate your allies on the battlefield.

lancers_impale.name: Lancer's Impale
lancers_impale.desc: [Spears] Hitting an enemy after a dodge makes your next attack deal bleed damage. If that attack would already bleed, it adds +10% chip damage instead.

driving_impact.name: Driving Impact
driving_impact.desc: [Spears] The first hit of your Spear's Critical Attack will deal greatly increased posture damage. Subsequent hits will do reduced posture damage.

defensive_sweep.name: Defensive Sweep
defensive_sweep.desc: [Spears] Posture breaking an opponent grants you +50% PEN for 3 seconds.

hoplite.name: Hoplite
hoplite.desc: Posture damage is reduced by 15% when wielding a spear and standing still.

blades_edge.name: Blade's Edge
blades_edge.desc: [Spears] Damage dealt with the tip of the spear is increased by 10%.

flash_point.name: Flash Point
flash_point.desc: Block breaking an opponent causes your Eruptions to be Empowered for the next 10s. 45s CD. Block breaking an opponent with a Fire Mantra procs Burning.

empowered_eruption.name: Empowered Eruption
empowered_eruption.desc: Your next Eruption after landing a critical is Empowered with +50% range and damage. 10s cooldown.

the_floor_is_lava.name: The Floor is Lava
the_floor_is_lava.desc:
Your eruptions leave pools of lava beneath them. Don't fall in.
[*The duration of your pools of lava scales on your Flamecharm investment.]

eruption_path_lava_serpent.name: Eruption Path: Lava Serpent
eruption_path_lava_serpent.desc: Your fire abilities no longer proc burn and instead proc on eruption under the enemies feet.

callout.name: Callout
callout.desc: You can mark objects or enemies by pressing Z, which will mark them for all nearby allies.

spotter.name: Spotter
spotter.desc: Marking enemies while in Rhythm will indicate their health status to your allies.

safety_dance.name: Safety Dance
safety_dance.desc: Your base dodge frames are increased by 0.05s.

observation.name: Observation
observation.desc: Dodge frames are larger if you cancel your roll immediately.

cyclone_blade.name: Cyclone Blade
cyclone_blade.desc: After a successful Gale Dash you wrap your weapon in wind essence causing your next Light attack to do bleed damage, and adding +10% chip damage.

pressure_break_agl.name: Pressure Break [AGL]
pressure_break_agl.desc: Breaking an enemy's posture will cause them to take intense wind pressure, increasing the attack's damage by +25% and flinging the enemy backwards.

pressure_break_str.name: Pressure Break [STR]
pressure_break_str.desc: Breaking an enemy's posture will cause them to take intense wind pressure, increasing the attack's damage by +25% and flinging the enemy backwards.

wind_step.name: Wind Step
wind_step.desc: Create a step of wind below you when jumping in the air. Jumping while sliding down a slope or off a cliff launches you forwards. (5s combat CD, 1s normal CD)

air_pressure.name: Air Pressure
air_pressure.desc: Dodging an attack or hitting an enemy's block will transform your next dash into a Gale Dash.

centurions_resolve.name: Centurion's Resolve
centurions_resolve.desc: Your Legion Kata attacks deal 10% more damage.

savior.name: Savior
savior.desc: After saving a player from being gripped gain a short speed boost for a short duration.

scorched_peak.name: Scorched Peak
scorched_peak.desc: Blockbreaking an enemy on fire or with a fire mantra causes them to be struck by lightning.

defiant_until_the_end.name: Defiant until the End
defiant_until_the_end.desc: Slow the enemy trying to execute you down with one last shout of your determination

the_eleventh_hour.name: The Eleventh Hour
the_eleventh_hour.desc: When below 15% health your mantras require no ether to cast for 11 seconds. 60s CD

last_resort.name: Last Resort
last_resort.desc: Deal +10% more damage when your health is significantly low.

comeback_kid.name: Comeback Kid
comeback_kid.desc: When waking up from being knocked you are unable to be knocked down for 5 seconds. (120 second cooldown)

entropy_link.name: Entropy Link
entropy_link.desc: The world is broken, linked by fragile webs. Traverse the path by stating your destination amidst the flame.

oath_linkstrider.name: Oath: Linkstrider
oath_linkstrider.desc: The Entropy Catalyst generated enough force to fundamentally change your state of existence. You now exist between two states, your newfound clarity making the imperceptible Bonds between all souls malleable to you.

symbiotic_link.name: Symbiotic Link
symbiotic_link.desc: Press X while hovering over an ally to buff them, or while hovering over an opponent to debuff them. The links you create are destroyed when you receive damage from an enemy.

thresher_scales.name: Thresher Scales
thresher_scales.desc: You regenerate your armor at campfires.

old_habits_die_hard.name: Old Habits Die Hard
old_habits_die_hard.desc: Blocking an attack with your lingering block frames after failing a parry will cause the attack to deal 15% less posture damage.

thresher_claws.name: Thresher Claws
thresher_claws.desc: All of your attacks have +5% more PEN. Your Basic Attacks and critical attacks have an additional +5% PEN on top.

stock_bash.name: Stock Bash
stock_bash.desc: [Rifles] Your running attacks now apply a brief amount of daze.

tactical_reload.name: Tactical Reload
tactical_reload.desc: [Rifles] Activate to make your rifle shoot bullets for 15 seconds. (90 second CD)

leg_shot.name: Leg Shot
leg_shot.desc: [Rifles] Landing a critical slows your enemy for a bit, and disables any speed boosts they get for the next 10 seconds.

survival_kit_int.name: Survival Kit [INT]
survival_kit_int.desc: You keep a well-stocked set of tools on your person at all times. Your flint never runs out of uses.

survival_kit_cha.name: Survival Kit [CHA]
survival_kit_cha.desc: You keep a well-stocked set of tools on your person at all times. Your flint never runs out of uses.

survival_kit_wil.name: Survival Kit [WIL]
survival_kit_wil.desc: You keep a well-stocked set of tools on your person at all times. Your flint never runs out of uses.

impervious_slumber.name: Impervious Slumber
impervious_slumber.desc: Getting hit while knocked no longer resets your time knocked.

breathing_exercise.name: Breathing Exercise
breathing_exercise.desc: Your sanity recovers more quickly once out of terrifying situations.

disbelief.name: Disbelief
disbelief.desc: You're resistant to the effects of Illusion magic. You are resistant to charms and tricks.

conquer_your_fears.name: Conquer your Fears
conquer_your_fears.desc: Killing the beings of the deep replenishes your Sanity somewhat. When an ally grips an enemy nearby to you, you regain Sanity.

art_of_the_deal.name: Art of the Deal
art_of_the_deal.desc: Your rapport with merchants gives you lower prices!

polished_armor.name: Polished Armor
polished_armor.desc: You receive 5% less damage when your Armor protects you from an attack and has over 90% durability. This 5% will scale up to 10% less damage at 100 MTL.

intuitive_repairs.name: Intuitive Repairs
intuitive_repairs.desc: Your "Iron Skin" repairs armor while it's active.

metal_thief.name: Metal Thief
metal_thief.desc: Pulling an opponent absorbs a portion of their current Armor durability.

metal_eater.name: Metal Eater
metal_eater.desc: When you have no Ether, consume armor durability to cast your Ironsing mantras.

metal_absorption.name: Metal Absorption
metal_absorption.desc: Your 'Iron Hug' also absorbs armor from the enemy.

chain_of_perfection.name: Chain of Perfection
chain_of_perfection.desc: You gain stacks of 'Perfection' on hitting mobs with basic attacks. Perfection increases your damage towards mobs the more stack you have. All stacks are lost upon taking damage.

shared_misery.name: Shared Misery
shared_misery.desc: Using a Basic Attack/Critical Attack on an enemy while losing sanity causes them to lose sanity.

echoing_lunatic.name: Echoing Lunatic
echoing_lunatic.desc: Your Ardour Scream now applies a bit of insanity.

lose_your_mind.name: Lose Your Mind
lose_your_mind.desc:
Deal more damage the more insane you are. Grants 15% damage at maximum insanity.
[Note: Will only proc below 70% sanity, and has diminishing returns.]

piercing_will.name: Piercing Will
piercing_will.desc: When your sanity is below 35%, gain up to +15% PEN on your attacks. Starting at 5% PEN, the lower your sanity, the higher your PEN.

elegy_of_light.name: Elegy of Light
elegy_of_light.desc: The Unspoken Vow of the Waking God resonates through you, if briefly. Protects you from the effects of Deep Gems for 3 minutes. Remains dormant until you take the life of an equal.

mocking_favor.name: Mocking Favor
mocking_favor.desc: When taunting, Aelita or Tillian appears, bestowing upon you a random boon of affliction (30s cooldown).

repeated_blows.name: Repeated Blows
repeated_blows.desc: Any strength mantra that has a Wrath Gem on it will reset its cooldown if you land a critical while a Wrath Gem is active.

withering_soul.name: Withering Soul
withering_soul.desc: Your Basic Attacks proc 12.5% of their damage as Wither. Wielding the Deepspindle will double the amount to 25%.

wormwarder.name: Wormwarder
wormwarder.desc: Your lantern generates a shroud of static electricity around you that the flesh-burrowing parasites of the Eternal Gale detest. it's not exactly the lightest thing to lug around, though.

surestep.name: Surestep
surestep.desc: Your boots secure your footing in all forms of terrain by digging into the ground with metal spikes.

looter.name: Looter
looter.desc: Gain extra loot from items you turn in for rewards.

ready_or_not.name: Ready or Not
ready_or_not.desc: The first attack to hit you while out of combat has its damage cut in half.

blinded.name: Blinded
blinded.desc: Your vision is obscured by something. Somehow, you feel safer. You remember the warmth of your youth.

already_dead.name: Already Dead
already_dead.desc: You take reduced damage from abilities with a health cost.

actions_speak_louder.name: Actions Speak Louder
actions_speak_louder.desc: Your critical attack cooldown is 20% shorter. but your Resonance cooldown is double as long. In areas where your Resonance is suppresed. reduces your cooldown by 5% instead

fleetfoot.name: Fleetfoot
fleetfoot.desc: Gain an initial speed boost when slide jumping.

featherfall.name: Featherfall
featherfall.desc: Prevents Falls from damaging you After sufficient damage has been resisted. the pendant will go inactive and require time to recharge.

volt_draft.name: Volt Draft
volt_draft.desc: Using Inhale will now also make your m1s apply a storm strike. [20 second CD]

paired_soul.name: Paired Soul
paired_soul.desc: Wielding a katana with this outfit grants extra damage.

stronger_under_pressure.name: Stronger Under Pressure
stronger_under_pressure.desc: Your mantras with might gem now slow down your opponents, scaling with how many combat tags you currently have.

pack_mule.name: Pack Mule
pack_mule.desc: The max quantity for food you can hold is increased by 5.

polite_awakening.name: Polite Awakening
polite_awakening.desc: Recover 15% of your max health after getting up from being downed. (Only Procs when below 20% HP)

replenishing_knockout.name: Replenishing Knockout
replenishing_knockout.desc: Gain more health and posture from downing enemies.

full_reset.name: Full Reset
full_reset.desc: Knocking an enemy resets your resonance cooldowns. This effect has a 60 second cooldown.

offensive_recovery.name: Offensive Recovery
offensive_recovery.desc: If all your mantras have Might Gems equipped, lose posture anytime you hit an opponents block with a mantra.

brunt.name: Brunt
brunt.desc: While 2-handling, you take less posture damage.

gourmand.name: Gourmand
gourmand.desc: Your hunger and thirst gain from eating increased.

brute_strength.name: Brute Strength
brute_strength.desc: Your vent is replaced with a ground slam attack that knocks back enemies.

fatal_strike.name: Fatal Strike
fatal_strike.desc: Landing a guardbreak with a strength mantra that has a Wrath Gem on it devastates your opponent, dealing extra damage and slowing them down.

brassneck.name: Brassneck
brassneck.desc: Knocking an enemy grants you 20% damage resistance for 15 seconds.

destructive_yell.name: Destructive Yell
destructive_yell.desc: Your ardour screams now break campfires around you.

martyr.name: Martyr
martyr.desc: Enemies gain less health and posture when knocking you.

rock_blaster.name: Rock Blaster
rock_blaster.desc: Doubles your ore yields when mining.

heavy_haul.name: Heavy Haul
heavy_haul.desc: Enemies who carry you move significantly slower.

knack.name: Knack
knack.desc: Trees yield more Wood when felled. Your Repair speed is increased.

flashwind.name: Flashwind
flashwind.desc: Anytime you proc Air Pressure or Overcharge, give yourself the ability to have enhanced dashes again for a few seconds.

wind_dancer.name: Wind Dancer
wind_dancer.desc: Roll cancelling twice in quick succession will grant you a speed boost. One of your rolls must dodge a hit.

tidekeeper.name: Tidekeeper
tidekeeper.desc: Losing 25% of your health within the span of 3 seconds grants a 15% damage buff, a 20% defence buff, and prevents you from being knocked for 10 seconds.

shock_trooper_specialist.name: Shock Trooper Specialist
shock_trooper_specialist.desc: Empower the mantras taught to you by your Legion Specialist Captain. You also now conjure a storm strike on your opponent by landing Gale and Thundercall mantras.

mass_effect.name: Mass Effect
mass_effect.desc: For every Might Gem you have equipped on your mantras, slightly increase each Might Gem's power.

benefactor.name: Benefactor
benefactor.desc: Gain reputation for selling goods to Antiquarians within faction territories.

primal_rage.name: Primal Rage
primal_rage.desc: If you are below 50%, unleash your rage and increase the amount of damage you deal for 25 seconds as well as being able to see enemy health when you hit them. [3 minute CD]

winters_presence.name: Winter's Presence
winters_presence.desc: Your tightly-bound winter gear negates elemental damage buffs from weather on damage against you. Also seems to provide some resistance to the Gale.

temple_guard.name: Temple Guard
temple_guard.desc: For the first 0.3s of your Critical Attack's windup, you take 90% less damage from any attacks that cancel your windup.

dragons_song.name: Dragon's Song
dragons_song.desc: Landing a Mantra after an uppercut grants Ether. 2s CD.

star_duster.name: Star Duster
star_duster.desc: You take 10% less damage from airborne enemies.

static_mastery.name: Static Mastery
static_mastery.desc: Your static withdraw no longer deals damage nor stuns you.

coldseep_reactor.name: Coldseep Reactor
coldseep_reactor.desc: By cultivating the local chemosynthetic microornganisms within the Depths and utilising them as a power source, your helm thrums with a protective field of static electricity and heat.

pleekstys_will.name: Pleeksty's Will
pleekstys_will.desc: You gain some Ether from consuming elemental ingredients.

refreeze.name: Refreeze
refreeze.desc: Landing any sort of ability that causes bottom freeze reduces the cooldown of your Orbital Ice by 5 seconds.

no_interruptions.name: No Interruptions
no_interruptions.desc: Wehn combat tagged by 2 or more players, render any ranged attack a lot less effective.

hyperbody.name: Hyperbody
hyperbody.desc: Apply a buff to your allies around you that increases your speed, defense, and regeneration. This effect becomes weaker the more allies you buff.

divers_resilience.name: Diver's Resilience
divers_resilience.desc: You can parry unparryable attack from giant monsters, but due to the heft of the plate you have slightly reduced speed.

treefelling_blow.name: Treefelling Blow
treefelling_blow.desc: You can collect lumber from the trees you fell with your fists. It's only natural.

volt_reflex.name: Volt Reflex
volt_reflex.desc: Your dodge window is increased with the power of your lightning, but also increases the cooldown of your dodges.

scholars_intuition.name: Scholar's Intuition
scholars_intuition.desc: INT, WIL, and CHA Training gear is 50% more effective.

lasting_trauma.name: Lasting Trauma
lasting_trauma.desc: Anytime you land a Wrath Gem, your opponent becomes fearful, being unable to use their critical for a few seconds after you land it.

lethal_dose.name: Lethal Dose
lethal_dose.desc: Doubles the duration of your poison from your hidden blade.

immortality.name: Immortality
immortality.desc: The remnants of the helmet's Mind Veil stir into life when you would be knocked, soaking all damage for a brief duration. 30s CD. Viscocity is rejected.

focused_hematoma.name: Focused Hematoma
focused_hematoma.desc: Decrease outside sources of blood loss by 25% but reduce the amount of temporary health you receive by 15%.

crippling_impact.name: Crippling Impact
crippling_impact.desc: Landing a critical on someone while Wrath Gem is active disables their vent for a few seconds.

vigils_grace.name: Vigil's Grace
vigils_grace.desc: Whenever you have a speed boost, increase your swing speed by 0.03.

soul_rip.name: Soul Rip
soul_rip.desc: Kill a player to gain 2 runes. Activate a rune when using this talent, and gain immense physical power, defense, and infinite Ether for 25 seconds. Beware its strenuous downside.

stormcall.name: Stormcall
stormcall.desc: Anytime you land a storm strike apply stormcall shock on your opponent, damaging them if they try to use a mantra while its active.

tempest_evolution.name: Tempest Evolution
tempest_evolution.desc: If you land a Tempest Wind, you deal 20% more damage in the air for a few seconds. Your Tempest Wind is also naturally stronger.

charisma_unbounded.name: Charisma Unbounded
charisma_unbounded.desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your charisma to its fullest.

murmur_ardour.name: Murmur: Ardour
murmur_ardour.desc: An application of the Song that enables one to channel the Murmur into raw strength. Press H.

murmur_tacet.name: Murmur: Tacet
murmur_tacet.desc: An application of the Song that enables the user to suppress their own murmur. Press T while crouched.

murmur_rhythm.name: Murmur: Rhythm
murmur_rhythm.desc: An application of the Song that enables the user to perceive the subtle Murmur emanating from all things. Press G while crouched.

ardour_scream.name: Ardour Scream
ardour_scream.desc: Amplify your shout into a scream using Ardour, dominating weaker foes. Victims take 12.5% more damage and 50% more posture damage for 10s.

steel_scales.name: Steel Scales
steel_scales.desc: You take an additional 5% less damage when your armor is broken.

padded_armor.name: Padded Armor
padded_armor.desc: While your armor is broken (or if you have no armor), you take 5% less damage.

armor_conserver.name: Armor Conserver
armor_conserver.desc: You lose 15% less armor when hit.

lightweight.name: Lightweight
lightweight.desc: Move faster when your armor runs out of durability.

fists_of_navae.name: Fists of Navae
fists_of_navae.desc: Your flourish timer lasts longer with fists.

captain_etrea.name: Captain Etrea
captain_etrea.desc: Moving while with a shield no longer slows you down.

way_of_navae.name: Way of Navae
way_of_navae.desc: Gain the ability to use fist combat against weapons. Including the ability to block weapons with your hands using Ether.

fists_of_fortitude.name: Fists of Fortitude
fists_of_fortitude.desc: [Fists] Every 6 hits with your fist builds of a shield of endurance reducing incoming damage by 15%. 70s CD.

chiefs_will.name: Chief's Will
chiefs_will.desc: Your Way of Navae light attacks have 25% additional penetration.

pressure_skewer.name: Pressure Skewer
pressure_skewer.desc: [Rapier] Flourishing an enemy causes your Basic Attacks to deal additional blood loss until you take damage.

duelists_lunge.name: Duelist's Lunge
duelists_lunge.desc: [Rapier] Running Basic Attacks deal increased posture damage. Upon landing your critical, your next running Basic Attack has increased range.

frenzied_dance.name: Frenzied Dance
frenzied_dance.desc: [Rapier] When your posture is about to collapse, you deal greater chip and posture damage.

speed_emission.name: Speed Emission
speed_emission.desc: Gain a slight speed boost after landing a vent.

fast_blade.name: Fast Blade
fast_blade.desc: Increase the speed boost you get from successfully parrying an attack.

lightspeed_reflexes.name: Lightspeed Reflexes
lightspeed_reflexes.desc: Feinting gives a brief auto-parry window.

oath_oathless.name: Oath: Oathless
oath_oathless.desc: You vow to never be bound to any oath; to live your life free of restraint. If free will is an illusion, why not make it a convincing one?

twelve_steps_ahead.name: Twelve Steps Ahead
twelve_steps_ahead.desc:
Landing Prediction will halve the cooldown to a minimum of 2s. Whiffing will double the cooldown to a maximum of 40s. This effect stacks up for up to 30 seconds.
[*Note: The penalty cooldown scales off of your Intelligence, with 30s at 80 Intelligence.]

all_knowing.name: All Knowing
all_knowing.desc: Your prediction now ignores the range requirement to reflect attacks.

intelligence_unbounded.name: Intelligence Unbounded
intelligence_unbounded.desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your intelligence to its fullest.

successive_prediction.name: Successive Prediction
successive_prediction.desc: Predicting an attack will briefly allow you to predict another.

strength_unbounded.name: Strength Unbounded
strength_unbounded.desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your strength to its fullest.

absolute_force.name: Absolute Force
absolute_force.desc: Evolve the technique of your Oppressive Force, letting both hits of your flourish deal 50% more posture damage.

amp_overdrive.name: Amp Overdrive
amp_overdrive.desc: Guardbreaking an opponent causes them to take extra thunder damage and applies Electrify for 7 seconds.

shocking_reverb.name: Shocking Reverb
