shocking_reverb.desc: Landing enough lightning Mantras without getting hit grants you a defensive lightning cloak for 15 seconds, letting you negate damage from light attacks and ironsing. [2 min CD]

martial_brutality.name: Martial Brutality
martial_brutality.desc: The less health your opponent has, the more posture damage you deal to them.

rapid_fire.name: Rapid Fire
rapid_fire.desc: [1H Guns] When you land a critical shot gain the ability to rapidly fire your critical for 2s. 12s cooldown.

rapid_reload.name: Rapid Reload
rapid_reload.desc: [1H Guns] You have 20% faster reload when reloading an empty pistol.

ultrakill.name: Ultrakill
ultrakill.desc: [1H Guns] When under the effects of Rapid Fire you reload 2x as fast. (Play Ultrakill)

lock_n_load.name: Lock n Load
lock_n_load.desc: [1H Guns] The first bullet in your gun does more damage when fully loaded. This damage buff scales with the number of bullets up to 15%. After fully reloading, the last bullet in your gun will do more damage. This damage buff scales with the number of bullets up to 15%.

sleight_of_hand.name: Sleight of Hand
sleight_of_hand.desc: [1H Guns] When you flourish an opponent, you instantly load a bullet.

environmentalist.name: Environmentalist
environmentalist.desc: Resist the effects of some weather events.

cult_of_personality.name: Cult of Personality
cult_of_personality.desc: You gain +3% PEN per each person Charmed. Capping at +15% PEN.

pardon_me.name: Pardon Me
pardon_me.desc: Crimes you commit in allied territories are often ignored. Who's asking?

harvester.name: Harvester
harvester.desc: Chance to receive two sets of ingredients when harvesting. You fell trees in fewer strikes.

excavator.name: Excavator
excavator.desc: Chance to receive two sets of ore when mining. You mine things more quickly.

celebrity.name: Celebrity
celebrity.desc: Your natural skill in mediating conflict makes people think more highly of you. Your base reputation with factions is higher and your reputation caps out higher.

youll_need_to_get_past_me.name: You'll Need To Get Past Me
youll_need_to_get_past_me.desc:
When you're attacked, one of your many allies will leap into action to protect their boss.
[*Note: 65s CD at 20 Charisma, 55s CD at 100 Charisma.]

under_the_radar.name: Under The Radar
under_the_radar.desc: The negative reputation threshold for a faction to put up on bounty posters is now higher.

going_nowhere.name: Going Nowhere
going_nowhere.desc: When enemies dodge your attacks, their momentum is killed and they're briefly prevented from sprinting.

volcanic_glass.name: Volcanic Glass
volcanic_glass.desc: Detonating crystals causes an eruption soon after.

hungry_flames.name: Hungry Flames
hungry_flames.desc: When you have no Ether, consume Stomach and Water to instantly cast your next fire mantra.

open_wound.name: Open Wound
open_wound.desc: Guardbreaking enemies leaves enemies more susceptible to blood loss from Bloodrend mantras.

blood_transfusion.name: Blood Transfusion
blood_transfusion.desc: Successfully landing a critical attack while under a negative status effect will transfer the effect plus recover a small portion of your blood bar. (20 second CD)

blood_bag.name: Blood Bag
blood_bag.desc: You receive extra blood from knocking an enemy.

just_a_taste.name: Just a Taste
just_a_taste.desc: First bloodrend mantra you hit in combat has increased blood drain.

bulldozer.name: Bulldozer
bulldozer.desc: Enemies you flourish into walls have a chance of breaking the wall and are guard broken on impact.

piercing_blow.name: Piercing Blow
piercing_blow.desc: Attacks that break an opponent's block ignore their Armor resistances.

broken_ankles.name: Broken Ankles
broken_ankles.desc: Blockbreaking an opponent puts their Mobility slot Mantras on CD for 12s. 30s CD

shield_breaker.name: Shield Breaker
shield_breaker.desc: Blunt damage now fully ignores the posture bonus from shields.

million_ton_piercer.name: Million Ton Piercer
million_ton_piercer.desc:
Gain additional PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.
[*The amount of additional PEN received scales with your Strength.]

unwavering_resolve.name: Unwavering Resolve
unwavering_resolve.desc:
Getting parried punishes your posture up to 33% less.
[*Note: 20% to 33% punishment reduction between 10 and 40 Strength.]

jolting_current.name: Jolting Current
jolting_current.desc: Your lightning attacks in water strike others near them with lightning.

conductors_cable.name: Conductor's Cable
conductors_cable.desc: Applying Conductor rods on opponents steals some of their armor to you.

rending_needle_jailer.name: Rending Needle: Jailer
rending_needle_jailer.desc: If an enemy has 5 or more rods, your Ironsing Pull will restrain them instead of pulling them.

rending_needle_augmenter_med.name: Rending Needle: Augmenter [MED]
rending_needle_augmenter_med.desc: If an enemy has 5 or more rods, your Ironsing Pull will use their rods to form a powerful sword to attack with. This also makes your Metal Armament stronger while the weapon is equipped.

rending_needle_augmenter_hvy.name: Rending Needle: Augmenter [HVY]
rending_needle_augmenter_hvy.desc: If an enemy has 5 or more rods, your Ironsing Pull will use their rods to form a powerful sword to attack with. This also makes your Metal Armament stronger while the weapon is equipped.

rending_needle_conductor.name: Rending Needle: Conductor
rending_needle_conductor.desc: 5 metal rods will combine into a conductor rod. If an enemy uses a non-Ironsing elemental mantra, they're dealt their element back in turn.

rending_needle_impaler.name: Rending Needle: Impaler
rending_needle_impaler.desc: If an enemy has 5 or more rods, your Ironsing Pull instead pulls out all of the rods for massive damage.

rending_needle_augmenter_lht.name: Rending Needle: Augmenter [LHT]
rending_needle_augmenter_lht.desc: If an enemy has 5 or more rods, your Ironsing Pull will use their rods to form a powerful sword to attack with. This also makes your Metal Armament stronger while the weapon is equipped.

hot_potato.name: Hot Potato
hot_potato.desc: Gain a large boost of speed after throwing a bomb. Your bombs have a chance to detonate twice.

family_recipe.name: Family Recipe
family_recipe.desc: You can now craft bombs at a crafting bench.

pocket_bombs.name: Pocket Bombs
pocket_bombs.desc: You have a chance to activate a bomb in your inventory when damaged.

incendiary_formula.name: Incendiary Formula
incendiary_formula.desc: Bombs will set your enemies on fire upon detonation, as well as launch with more force. Bombs will deal 20% increased damage to burning enemies.

sulphur_surprise.name: Sulphur Surprise
sulphur_surprise.desc: Your cooldown for throwing bombs will be shortened after your first bomb damages on enemy.

explosive_efficiency.name: Explosive Efficiency
explosive_efficiency.desc: When crafting bombs, you craft double the amount. You have the chance to triple the amount.

chorus_of_souls.name: Chorus of Souls
chorus_of_souls.desc: Alone, the Wisps lack a voice. But surrounded by so many, the frequencies overlap and you hear it true.
chorus_of_souls.reqs: oath_oathless => chorus_of_souls := 30s ICE, 30s FLM, 30s LTN, 30s WND, 30s SDW, 30s MTL, 30s BLD

will_o_wisp_wnd.name: Will o' Wisp [WND]
will_o_wisp_wnd.desc: Your mastery over the Wisps of the Song enables you to mediate the innate conflicts between your Wisps, allowing any number of Wisps to be active at a time.

will_o_wisp_ice.name: Will o' Wisp [ICE]
will_o_wisp_ice.desc: Your mastery over the Wisps of the Song enables you to mediate the innate conflicts between your Wisps, allowing any number of Wisps to be active at a time.

will_o_wisp_bld.name: Will o' Wisp [BLD]
will_o_wisp_bld.desc: Your mastery over the Wisps of the Song enables you to mediate the innate conflicts between your Wisps, allowing any number of Wisps to be active at a time.

will_o_wisp_sdw.name: Will o' Wisp [SDW]
will_o_wisp_sdw.desc: Your mastery over the Wisps of the Song enables you to mediate the innate conflicts between your Wisps, allowing any number of Wisps to be active at a time.

wisp_convergence.name: Wisp Convergence
wisp_convergence.desc: When empowered by the Chorus, your Wisps now grant their elements to your strikes.
wisp_convergence.reqs: oath_oathless, chorus_of_souls => wisp_convergence := 30s ICE, 30s FLM, 30s LTN, 30s WND, 30s SDW, 30s MTL, 30s BLD

will_o_wisp_mtl.name: Will o' Wisp [MTL]
will_o_wisp_mtl.desc: Your mastery over the Wisps of the Song enables you to mediate the innate conflicts between your Wisps, allowing any number of Wisps to be active at a time.

will_o_wisp_flm.name: Will o' Wisp [FLM]
will_o_wisp_flm.desc: Your mastery over the Wisps of the Song enables you to mediate the innate conflicts between your Wisps, allowing any number of Wisps to be active at a time.

will_o_wisp_ltn.name: Will o' Wisp [LTN]
will_o_wisp_ltn.desc: Your mastery over the Wisps of the Song enables you to mediate the innate conflicts between your Wisps, allowing any number of Wisps to be active at a time.

light_weapons_unbounded.name: Light Weapons Unbounded
light_weapons_unbounded.desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your Light Weapons attribute to its fullest.

heavy_weapons_unbounded.name: Heavy Weapons Unbounded
heavy_weapons_unbounded.desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your Heavy Weapons attribute to its fullest.

medium_weapons_unbounded.name: Medium Weapons Unbounded
medium_weapons_unbounded.desc: You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your Medium Weapons attribute to its fullest.

oath_saintsworn.name: Oath: Saintsworn
oath_saintsworn.desc: A vow to the fallen heroes. Press L to swap to Saintsblade.
oath_saintsworn.reqs: oath_saintsworn := 15s ICE, 15s FLM, 15s LTN, 15s WND, 15s SDW

saints_negation.name: Saint's Negation
saints_negation.desc: Once per stance cycle you can fully block an attack that matches your Saint Stance.

heros_assist.name: Hero's Assist
heros_assist.desc: Heroes come to your aid based on your Saint Stance.

saints_synergy.name: Saint's Synergy
saints_synergy.desc: 25% of your highest element scaling is applied to other elemental damage.

ether_proselyte.name: Ether Proselyte
ether_proselyte.desc: All of your Elemental Mantras below Lv. 5 are 1 Mantra Level higher. Your Mantras are converted to the element of your active stance.

saints_overload.name: Saint's Overload
saints_overload.desc: After a full rotation of stances your elemental scaling is increased by 15% and Mantra Modifiers [are] increased by 10%.

perpetual_distillery.name: Perpetual Distillery
perpetual_distillery.desc: Your very body has become a distillery for your alchemy. Gain 3 Autobrew slots that will automatically produce 3 concoctions of your choice.

aromatic_salts.name: Aromatic Salts
aromatic_salts.desc: Alter your brews to create lingering clouds of mist on shattering . Does not count towards the ingredient limit.

antithetic_salts.name: Antithetic Salts
antithetic_salts.desc: Alter your brews to invert their effects. Does not count towards the ingredient limit.

biotic_salts.name: Biotic Salts
biotic_salts.desc: Alter your brews to have reduced positive effects on your enemies and somewhat reduced negative effects on your allies when thrown. Does not count towards the ingredient limit.

oath_saltchemist.name: Oath: Saltchemist
oath_saltchemist.desc: You vow to dedicate body and mind to the furthering of the Material Arts. Your body is a conduit through which true knowledge shall be siphoned. Knowledge is power, and you shall be its vessel.

enhanced_flow_med.name: Enhanced Flow [MED]
enhanced_flow_med.desc: Refine your Rush Hour, allowing you to now also gain temp health whenever you hit a player while using Rush Hour. You now also take less damage from using Rush Hour.

enhanced_flow_lht.name: Enhanced Flow [LHT]
enhanced_flow_lht.desc: Refine your Rush Hour, allowing you to now also gain temp health whenever you hit a player while using Rush Hour. You now also take less damage from using Rush Hour.

enhanced_flow_hvy.name: Enhanced Flow [HVY]
enhanced_flow_hvy.desc: Refine your Rush Hour, allowing you to now also gain temp health whenever you hit a player while using Rush Hour. You now also take less damage from using Rush Hour.

dark_receiver.name: Dark Receiver
dark_receiver.desc: Shadow moves will also steal Ether from those you are Static Linked tethered to.

blood_bank.name: Blood Bank
blood_bank.desc: Consuming 'Charm' now gives slight temporary health.

donation_drive.name: Donation Drive
donation_drive.desc:
Consuming 'Charm' on an opponent replenishes some blood. Additionally, you can also activate this effect and Manipulator through blockbreaking with a Bloodrend mantra.
[*Note: 12s to 8s CD between 20 and 60 Charisma.]

sharing_is_caring.name: Sharing is Caring
sharing_is_caring.desc: Your 'Charm' on opponents also slightly increases your blood drain against them.

windwaker.name: Windwaker
windwaker.desc: Call upon a gust of wind to propel your boat even faster.

pocket_sand.name: Pocket Sand
pocket_sand.desc: [Fist] Feinting into an uppercut blinds and dazes your opponents briefly. We're even now, right? 30s cooldown

dirty_boxing.name: Dirty Boxing
dirty_boxing.desc: Enemies hit after you feint them with your fist suffer slight bleed and have their vision obscured slightly. 5s cooldown.

gilded_path_scrapsinger.name: Gilded Path: Scrapsinger
gilded_path_scrapsinger.desc: Flourishing an enemy consumes any rods they have and siphones their armor to you per rod.

artisans_blade.name: Artisan's Blade
artisans_blade.desc: Activating Scrapsinger forges a metal blade behind you for every 2 rods you consume. Metal blades will fire at a target upon landing an ironsing or metal infused attack.

songs_unforged.name: Songs Unforged
songs_unforged.desc: Your weapon criticals will now activate Scrapsinger

refine_and_reuse.name: Refine and Reuse
refine_and_reuse.desc: Consuming rods with Scrapsinger reduces incoming PEN against you for 14 seconds. Each rod reduces PEN by 5% multiplicatively.

reshape_and_remold.name: Reshape and Remold
reshape_and_remold.desc:
Successful procs of Scrapsinger will increase the amount of armor damage your opponent takes. After hitting 10 stacks, the opponent will take +5% damage until the stacks drop below 10.
[*This talent loses some effectiveness when below its requirements.]
reshape_and_remold.reqs: gilded_path_scrapsinger, refine_and_reuse, artisans_blade, songs_unforged, masterwork => reshape_and_remold := 70s MTL

masterwork.name: Masterwork
masterwork.desc: Successful hits from Artisan Blades will proc metal rods and deal 50% more damage.

tainted_ground.name: Tainted Ground
tainted_ground.desc: Enemies who stand in blood pools will not decay blood poison.

hemolytic_transfusion.name: Hemolytic Transfusion
hemolytic_transfusion.desc: Guardbreaking an enemy with a Bloodrend mantra increases the amount of blood poison from the attack.

hemolysis.name: Hemolysis
hemolysis.desc: Deal 20% more critical attack damage to opponents with over 25% blood poisoning.

gruesome_harvest.name: Gruesome Harvest
gruesome_harvest.desc: Landing Bloodrend mantras on opponents with over 70% blood poison will give you slight temporary health.

panacea.name: Panacea
panacea.desc:
Hitting an enemy with a Bloodrend mantra stops their blood poison from decaying briefly.
[*Note: Lasts for 7 seconds.]

vasculitis.name: Vasculitis
vasculitis.desc: Your opponent cannot proc deep gems if they have over 20% blood poisoning for a brief duration. *Must hit them while they are over 20% BP.)

juicy_snack.name: Juicy Snack
juicy_snack.desc: Eliminating enemies returns their amount of blood poision as health to you.

shadowcast_unbounded.name: Shadowcast Unbounded
shadowcast_unbounded.desc:
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your shadowcast to its fullest.
[Note: Falling below 75 Shadowcast revokes this Talent.]

lasting_sorrow.name: Lasting Sorrow
lasting_sorrow.desc: Shadow lasts longer on your opponent.

adept_shadowcaster.name: Adept Shadowcaster
adept_shadowcaster.desc: You can now obtain 1-Star Leveled Shadowcaster Mantras.

shadowcaster.name: Shadowcaster
shadowcaster.desc: Harnesss the power of Shadow in your mantra crafting.

master_shadowcaster.name: Master Shadowcaster
master_shadowcaster.desc: You can now obtain 3-Star Leveled Shadowcaster Mantras.

blossoming_darkness.name: Blossoming Darkness
blossoming_darkness.desc: Ether drained during Shadow Roar increases the size of it.

singularity.name: Singularity
singularity.desc: Enemies will briefly hang in place when hit by a shadow move.

fear_the_dark.name: Fear the Dark
fear_the_dark.desc: Enemies that run from you after being hit by your shadows will hang in place briefly.

sightless_still.name: Sightless Still
sightless_still.desc: The more a person is affected by your shadowcast the more you obscure their vision. Block breaking an opponent obscures their vision with darkness more potent than your Shadow mantra.

shadow_travel.name: Shadow Travel
shadow_travel.desc: Teleport to a location in exchange for Ether cost. Certain ranges will require a health sacrifice. Be careful as this technique can prove lethal to the user.

expert_shadowcaster.name: Expert Shadowcaster
expert_shadowcaster.desc: You can now obtain 2-Star Leveled Shadowcaster Mantras.

knights_rally.name: Knight's Rally
knights_rally.desc: When using a shield, you ready your block more quickly after taking a hit.

turtle_shell.name: Turtle Shell
turtle_shell.desc: If your shield is on your back, take reduced backstab damage and negate Spine Cutter.

spare_nails.name: Spare Nails
spare_nails.desc: You always keep a couple spare. Your repairs are more efficient and you no longer drop Wood on death.

emergency_repairs.name: Emergency Repairs
emergency_repairs.desc: Your repairs are twice as efficient when the ship is on low health. Your repairs scale somewhat with the Max Health of the ship.

grounding_bolt_hvy.name: Grounding Bolt [HVY]
grounding_bolt_hvy.desc: Anytime you summon a lightning strike on your opponent, apply knockdown if it lands.

grounding_bolt_med.name: Grounding Bolt [MED]
grounding_bolt_med.desc: Anytime you summon a lightning strike on your opponent, apply knockdown if it lands.

grounding_bolt_lht.name: Grounding Bolt [LHT]
grounding_bolt_lht.desc: Anytime you summon a lightning strike on your opponent, apply knockdown if it lands.

unnecessary_theatrics.name: Unnecessary Theatrics
unnecessary_theatrics.desc: Deliver a one-liner on uppercuts, flourishes, and critical attacks that charms your opponents briefly.

silencers_blade.name: Silencer's Blade
silencers_blade.desc: Meleeing a 'Suffocated' opponent will extend the duration of the Suffocation and grant a speed boost.

a_world_without_song.name: A World Without Song
a_world_without_song.desc:
Every 3-4 hits with a Wind Mantra now procs Suffocate.
[*Note: Takes 4 hits if between 40 and 74 Galebreathe.]

merciless_blade.name: Merciless Blade
merciless_blade.desc: You now execute enemies much faster.

flow_state.name: Flow State
flow_state.desc: Enter a moment of extreme focus in which you can change the windup of your special attack with the correct timing.

oath_silentheart.name: Oath: Silentheart
oath_silentheart.desc:
You vow to reject the Words of the Song, denying yourself of mantras in pursuit of your own path to true strength, no matter the cost. You can wield weapons with half the usual requirements.
[Note: Only reduces requirements by 25, not half.]

true_vantage.name: True Vantage
true_vantage.desc: Venting makes you invisible briefly while boosting your speed.

silent_cascade.name: Silent Cascade
silent_cascade.desc: Landing physical attacks on an opponent charges up your Silent Cascade, a devastating barrage that can be unleashed with CTRL + M2.

ankle_cutter.name: Ankle Cutter
ankle_cutter.desc: You can now do a special ground slash while sliding, applying a temporary speed debuff to those hit, as well as preventing jumping.

relentless_hunt.name: Relentless Hunt
relentless_hunt.desc: Basic Attack while doing an Aerial Attack to initiate a special gap closer attack.

rising_star.name: Rising Star
rising_star.desc: Press CTRL + M2 to activate a special uppercut attack.

dread_fighter.name: Dread Fighter
dread_fighter.desc: Parrying and getting hit by mantras now give you stacks of Dread. Each stack increases your mantra resistance, up to 25%. Each stack lasts for 15 seconds.

vengeful_pursuit.name: Vengeful Pursuit
vengeful_pursuit.desc: Your running Basic Attacks that don't hit send out a special mid-range crescent projectile that slows on hit. Tracks onto those with their backs turned to you. 8s CD.

mayhem.name: Mayhem
mayhem.desc: Initiate a special dash attack by pressing Basic Attack during the start of your dodge.

unmatched_dexterity.name: Unmatched Dexterity
unmatched_dexterity.desc: Press X to Quick Swap between weapons within your toolbar.

snake_oil.name: Snake Oil
snake_oil.desc: Okay, the amount you're charging people for your items is downright criminal. But I'm just a talent description, I can't stop you.

friends_in_high_places.name: Friends in High Places
friends_in_high_places.desc: Your connections often let you off the hook when you're in trouble with the law. Nepotism sure does pay!

golden_tongue.name: Golden Tongue
golden_tongue.desc: Typing gives a random buff to you and those around you. (60 second cooldown)

ether_overdrive_mtl.name: Ether Overdrive [MTL]
ether_overdrive_mtl.desc:
Gain additional PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.
[*The amount of additional PEN received scales with your Intelligence.]

ether_overdrive_bld.name: Ether Overdrive [BLD]
ether_overdrive_bld.desc:
Gain additional PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.
[*The amount of additional PEN received scales with your Intelligence.]

ether_overdrive_wnd.name: Ether Overdrive [WND]
ether_overdrive_wnd.desc:
Gain additional PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.
[*The amount of additional PEN received scales with your Intelligence.]

ether_overdrive_ice.name: Ether Overdrive [ICE]
ether_overdrive_ice.desc:
Gain additional PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.
[*The amount of additional PEN received scales with your Intelligence.]

ether_overdrive_sdw.name: Ether Overdrive [SDW]
ether_overdrive_sdw.desc:
Gain additional PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.
[*The amount of additional PEN received scales with your Intelligence.]

ether_overdrive_ltn.name: Ether Overdrive [LTN]
ether_overdrive_ltn.desc:
Gain additional PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.
[*The amount of additional PEN received scales with your Intelligence.]

ether_overdrive_flm.name: Ether Overdrive [FLM]
ether_overdrive_flm.desc:
Gain additional PEN and remove the cap on your PEN. Go beyond your limits.
[*The amount of additional PEN received scales with your Intelligence.]

absolute_pitch.name: Absolute Pitch
absolute_pitch.desc: You can cast Ritual Mantras instantly.

bloodiron_spirit.name: Bloodiron Spirit
bloodiron_spirit.desc: You regain some Armor upon killing enemies.

murmur_tacet_oath.name: Murmur: Tacet [OATH]
murmur_tacet_oath.desc: An application of the Song that enables the user to suppress their own murmur. Press T while crouched.

formless.name: Formless
formless.desc: Teleport to a location within your Tacet bubble. Receive a slight speed boost when activating Tacet.

spotter_oath.name: Spotter [OATH]
spotter_oath.desc: Marking enemies while in Rhythm will indicate their health status to your allies.

murmur_ardour_oath.name: Murmur: Ardour [OATH]
murmur_ardour_oath.desc: An application of the Song that enables one to channel the Murmur into raw strength. Press H.

oath_soulbreaker.name: Oath: Soulbreaker
oath_soulbreaker.desc: The sum of your fragments is greater than the whole. Though your very being is splintered and threatening to drift apart, every shard of you Vows to remain One. Your Oath is solvent that joins all of your distinct selves into the gestalt you.

soul_infusion.name: Soul Infusion
soul_infusion.desc: Infuse Ardour into your executions. If your execute is interrupted, the opponent remains down for a longer amount of time. Your Ardour Screams are projected further.

murmur_rhythm_oath.name: Murmur: Rhythm [OATH]
murmur_rhythm_oath.desc: An application of the Song that enables the user to perceive the subtle Murmur emanating from all things. Press G while crouched.

heart_reverb.name: Heart Reverb
heart_reverb.desc: Those picked up by your Rhythm are marked for 8 seconds. Whenever an opponent dodges your attack, detect their rhythm and vigor. You can use Rhythm while standing.

ardour_scream_oath.name: Ardour Scream [OATH]
ardour_scream_oath.desc: Amplify your shout into a scream using Ardour, dominating weaker foes. Victims take 25% more damage and 50% more posture damage for 10s.

chime_of_conflict.name: Chime of Conflict
chime_of_conflict.desc: Drift in and out of reality, challenging those hailing from distant lands. Grants you the ability to access the PvP Arena.

haunted_path_specter.name: Haunted Path: Specter
haunted_path_specter.desc: Build up spectral energy by performing successful dodges and landing Wind mantras. Phantom winds from Haunted Gale no longer appear. You can no longer suffocate enemies.

vanishing_wraith.name: Vanishing Wraith
vanishing_wraith.desc: Your 'Aerial Attacks' while in Phantom Step will now teleport you behind your target.

possession.name: Possession
possession.desc:
After an apparition hits an enemy, receive 15% posture damage on all Galebreath attacks for 6 seconds. If the apparition hits while you have Phantom Step activated, receive a 15% chip damage buff as well for the same duration.
[*This talent loses some effectiveness when below its requirements.]

apparitions.name: Apparitions
apparitions.desc: Your Haunted Phantoms become Apparitions that apply Winded on hit. Apparitions cannot be parried if you are in Phantom Step.

phantom_step.name: Phantom Step
phantom_step.desc: Press X to begin running at high speeds and your regular dashes transform into gale dashes. (Must have at least 10% Spectral Gauge)

oath_starkindred.name: Oath: Starkindred
oath_starkindred.desc: You vow to feel the knowledge of all that is, all at once. Your heart beats with the world itself, as the Stars above watch over you.

death_from_above.name: Death From Above
death_from_above.desc: Upon cancelling your Air Dash, reveal your wings and strike your enemy.

static_ace.name: Static Ace
static_ace.desc: Using Lightning Stream with an active tether targets your closest active link.

link_conduction.name: Link Conduction
link_conduction.desc: While you have active tethers your lightning mantras cost less ether.

static_allure.name: Static Allure
static_allure.desc: Having two active tethers will cause the previous tethered enemy to get magnetized to your newest tethered enemy, also increases the duration of tethers by 15 seconds.

static_link.name: Static Link
static_link.desc: Flourishing or uppercutting an enemy creates a static link between you and your enemy.

jumper_cables.name: Jumper Cables
jumper_cables.desc: Getting knocked with an active tether allows you to steal health from tethered targets and not get knocked.

storm_link.name: Storm Link
storm_link.desc: While you have a Static Link on someone, your Wind mantras that hit them are imbued with flashes of Lightning.

unfazed.name: Unfazed
unfazed.desc: You are more resilient to the side effects of going insane. You no longer Shiver and you Panic with less severity.

magical_resolve.name: Magical Resolve
magical_resolve.desc: Being hit increases Ether regen for a short duration, the strength of the regen scales off your Willpower.

grasp_on_reality.name: Grasp on Reality
grasp_on_reality.desc: Damage taken from insanity is reduced.

sunset_ricochet.name: Sunset Ricochet
sunset_ricochet.desc:
Your bullets ricochet to a nearby enemy when hitting an opponent.
[*Note: Hits up to two people.]

voltaic_conductor.name: Voltaic Conductor
voltaic_conductor.desc: Your Thundercall Mantras deal 20% chip damage against enemies with conductor rods.

termite.name: Termite
termite.desc: You can eat things most would consider inedible.

iron_gut_fort.name: Iron Gut [FORT]
iron_gut_fort.desc: You have resistance against being poisoned by foods.

iron_gut_will.name: Iron Gut [WILL]
iron_gut_will.desc: You have resistance against being poisoned by foods.

none_left_behind.name: None Left Behind
none_left_behind.desc: You can now shadestep to pick up knocked humanoids far away from you. 4s CD.

dustlunge.name: Dustlunge
dustlunge.desc:
You can now assassinate enemies from much farther range, shadestepping to their location if they're too far. You automatically assassinate other nearby enemies.
[*This talent loses some effectiveness when below its requirements.]
dustlunge.reqs: lowstride, lights_out, deep_wound, unseen_threat => dustlunge := 90s AGL

target_switch.name: Target Switch
target_switch.desc: Parrying an opponent then hitting someone else makes your next mantra free.

foolish_outburst.name: Foolish Outburst
foolish_outburst.desc:
Blocking or parrying a vent will absorb the Tempo cost of the vent. A Tactician steadies the course of battle.
[*Absorbs 20% to 40% of the vent's Tempo between 20 INT and 50 INT.]

hard_read.name: Hard Read
hard_read.desc: Hitting your opponent during a feint will cause them to be dazed.

punishing_blow.name: Punishing Blow
punishing_blow.desc: [Heavy Weapons] Daze opponents for 1s when you interrupt their Basic Attack with your own.

water_off_a_ducks_back.name: Water off a Duck's Back
water_off_a_ducks_back.desc: Venting will shift any elemental status effects affecting you onto those hit by your vent. Will also remove potion splash statuses on vent.

controlled_combustion.name: Controlled Combustion
controlled_combustion.desc: Your Agitating Spark no longer spreads to your allies. All-Consuming Flame no longer applies against allies.

artisan_chef.name: Artisan Chef
artisan_chef.desc: The food you cook now becomes Artisan food, increasing it's hunger and thirst gained by +25%.

master_chef.name: Master Chef
master_chef.desc: Buffs applied by food you cook now have their buffs amplified by +30%.

flaming_flourish.name: Flaming Flourish
flaming_flourish.desc: Set enemies on fire when you flourish or uppercut them.

explosive_finish.name: Explosive Finish
explosive_finish.desc: If an enemy is on fire when you flourish, blast them away with a fire blast.

mirage_clone.name: Mirage Clone
mirage_clone.desc: Successfully dodging leaves a heat mirage clone that sets enemies that swung at you on fire.

emperor_flame.name: Emperor Flame
emperor_flame.desc: Absorb fire produced by you, once you reach 5 stacks your next attack will be an automatic Explosive Finish flourish.

voideye.name: Voideye
voideye.desc: Voidmother's blessing, the method to travel back to the Voidheart.

grasp_of_eylis.name: Grasp of Eylis
grasp_of_eylis.desc: You can temporarily teleport to locations near your bounty target, if one can be found. However, you must stay close, or be desynchronised.

last_second_negotiations.name: Last Second Negotiations
last_second_negotiations.desc: Most enemies will hesitate a moment longer before executing you.

pickpocket.name: Pickpocket
pickpocket.desc: Gain the ability to pickpocket by pressing "N" on a downed person.

another_mans_trash.name: Another Man's Trash
another_mans_trash.desc: Take unequipped equipment when mugging a player.
another_mans_trash.reqs: cap_artist, pickpocket, master_thief => another_mans_trash := 10s AGL, 35s CHA

master_thief.name: Master Thief
master_thief.desc: Gain more notes when mugging a player.

cap_artist.name: Cap Artist
cap_artist.desc: Pressing [R] while crouching allows you to fake being dead.

discharge.name: Discharge
discharge.desc: [Light Weapons] On 5th successfull attack you will discharge static dealing lightning damage to those nearby.

windup_battery.name: Windup Battery
windup_battery.desc: Landing 3 Thundercall Mantras without whiffing reduces the windup of your next Mantra by 10%.

rain_of_static.name: Rain of Static
rain_of_static.desc: After successfully casting lightning impact, strike down countless thunder at those below. In return your Lightning Impact will require more time to cast.

overcharge.name: Overcharge
overcharge.desc: Your next dash after activating Static Blade is enhanced by lightning.

gathering_electricity_agl.name: Gathering Electricity [AGL]
gathering_electricity_agl.desc: [Medium Weapons] Reaching 5 Static Blade charges automatically consumes the stacks and applies a lightning buff to your weapon. 60 second cooldown.

gathering_electricity_str.name: Gathering Electricity [STR]
gathering_electricity_str.desc: [Medium Weapons] Reaching 5 Static Blade charges automatically consumes the stacks and applies a lightning buff to your weapon. 60 second cooldown.

static_blade.name: Static Blade
static_blade.desc: [Medium Weapons] Hitting blocks or blocking or parrying hits will now generate an electric chage in your blade, granting a small speed buff. Charges can stack up to 5 times.

thundercall_unbounded.name: Thundercall Unbounded
thundercall_unbounded.desc:
You have gained the ability to surpass your limits and train your thundercall to its fullest.
[Note: Falling below 75 Thundercall revokes this Talent.]

master_thundercaller.name: Master Thundercaller
master_thundercaller.desc: You can now obtain 3-star Thundercaller mantras.

adept_thundercaller.name: Adept Thundercaller
adept_thundercaller.desc: You can now obtain 1-star Thundercaller mantras.

thundercaller.name: Thundercaller
thundercaller.desc: Grants you the ability to command Lightning as a Thundercaller.

discovery_of_fire.name: Discovery of Fire
discovery_of_fire.desc: Flints and Flamecharm are for simpletons.

static_fakeout.name: Static Fakeout
static_fakeout.desc: Roll cancelling immediately after a parry will cause you to teleport behind your opponent.

stratoshock.name: Stratoshock
stratoshock.desc: Your lightning deals an additional 5% damage when in the rain.

static_flash_clone.name: Static Flash Clone
static_flash_clone.desc: When using lightning clones you disappear leaving behind a static clone for a short duration.

expert_thundercaller.name: Expert Thundercaller
expert_thundercaller.desc: You can now obtain 2-star Thundercaller mantras.

shocking_finish.name: Shocking Finish
shocking_finish.desc: Following a flourish up with a lightning beam causes it to be casted instantly.

unbreakable.name: Unbreakable
unbreakable.desc: Reduces the time you spend stunned after being block broken.

manipulator.name: Manipulator
manipulator.desc: Deal 20% more critical attack damage to charmed enemies, but the effect is removed on impact.

narcissist.name: Narcissist
narcissist.desc: Charming an already Charmed opponent Overcharms you briefly. Guess you really were always that great.

hypovolemic_focus.name: Hypovolemic Focus
hypovolemic_focus.desc: While you have temporary health, your opponent regains far less posture from parrying you.

embolism.name: Embolism
embolism.desc: If an enemy is guardbroken while you have temporary health, convert your temporary health into additional damage.

cyclical_exsanguination.name: Cyclical Exsanguination
cyclical_exsanguination.desc: Whenever you deal more than 20 damage to an enemy in an instance, pause your temporary health decay for 3 seconds.

sow_and_mend.name: Sow and Mend
sow_and_mend.desc: Sacrifice 35% of your blood for temporary health.

pursuit.name: Pursuit
pursuit.desc:
If you land your Revenge, clear the cooldown immediately.
[*Note: 35s to 25s cooldown between 50 and 90 Agility.]

crippling_comeuppance.name: Crippling Comeuppance
crippling_comeuppance.desc:
Landing Revenge puts your opponent's Mobility slot Mantras on CD for 15s.
[*Note: 10s to 15s CD between 50 and 100 Agility.]

cheap_shot.name: Cheap Shot
cheap_shot.desc:
Your attacks gain up to 10% PEN multiplicatively when you have an active speed boost.
[*Note: 5% to 10% PEN between 20 and 65 Agility.]

maiming_claws.name: Maiming Claws
maiming_claws.desc: Down Comes the Claw now disables your opponents posture regeneration for 6s on proc.

down_comes_the_claw.name: Down Comes the Claw
down_comes_the_claw.desc:
Landing a Critical while you have a speed boost prevents your opponent from being able to dodge twice in a row for up to 6.5s.
[*Note: 4s to 6.5s duration between 30 and 75 Agility.]

turning_of_the_wheel.name: Turning of the Wheel
turning_of_the_wheel.desc: [Twinblade] After perfect dodging a swing or critical attack, step backwards and ramp up your swingspeed.

face_cutter.name: Face Cutter
face_cutter.desc: [Twinblade] Your Spine Cutter now deals an additional hit.

moths_to_a_flame.name: Moths to a Flame
moths_to_a_flame.desc: Your Twisted Puppets now home towards burning enemies.

burning_puppets.name: Burning Puppets
burning_puppets.desc: Your puppets can now inflict burn and fire-based talents when they explode.

wraith_path_twisted_puppets.name: Wraith Path: Twisted Puppets
wraith_path_twisted_puppets.desc: Your Flamecharm mantras summon puppets of shadow and flame. Your flames are now black.

explosive_rage.name: Explosive Rage
explosive_rage.desc: Causing explosions will make your puppets go into a frenzy - speeding up and dealing slightly more damage.

burning_sacrifice.name: Burning Sacrifice
burning_sacrifice.desc: Sacrifice puppets who have been alive for half of their lifetime and burn purple for Flame Emperor Stacks.

no_survivors.name: No Survivors
no_survivors.desc: Your allies and yourself execute faster while affected by Overcharm.

audacity.name: Audacity
audacity.desc:
Once you've brought down your prey, instill fear into all those who would seperate you from claiming it. Charmed or nearby enemies will fear for longer. Nearby allies gain a 10% damage buff.
[*Note: CD scales from 30s to 40s with your Charisma and Strength stats, between 50 and 150.]

rule_through_fear.name: Rule Through Fear
rule_through_fear.desc: Executing an enemy applies Overcharm to nearby allies and yourself.

undying_flame.name: Undying Flame
undying_flame.desc: Your flame can be casted in the depths. Standing close to your graceful flame will slowly restore sanity for others in the area.

denial_repulse.name: Denial Repulse
denial_repulse.desc: You now emit a delayed burst of flames after coming close to death.

silencers_song_med.name: Silencer's Song [MED]
silencers_song_med.desc: Silencer's Blade now procs on your mantras.

jetstream.name: Jetstream
jetstream.desc: The favor of the winds is yours: landing three hits (five for light weapons) without taking damage against your opponent envelops you in a shield of wind.

umami.name: Umami
umami.desc: Feast on foes with mighty cutlery. Chef Weapons now steal opponents hunger.

silencers_song_lht.name: Silencer's Song [LHT]
silencers_song_lht.desc: Silencer's Blade now procs on your mantras.

grotesque_resilience.name: Grotesque Resilience
grotesque_resilience.desc:
You take reduced damage from 'Damage over Time' effects. 
[50%, 25% while Flame Within is active.]
[Bleed reduction is 25%.]

overwhelming_might.name: Overwhelming Might
overwhelming_might.desc: Strong Left, Table Flip and Skyshatter Kick now all guardbreak at level 5.

silencers_song_hvy.name: Silencer's Song [HVY]
silencers_song_hvy.desc: Silencer's Blade now procs on your mantras.

simmerbloom.name: Simmerbloom
simmerbloom.desc: Basic Attacks on Pleeksty's Inferno are now granted flames.

closed_circuit.name: Closed Circuit
closed_circuit.desc: Surge Overloads that fail to arc to other opponents will deal additional damage to the Overloaded enemy.

battery_sapper.name: Battery Sapper
battery_sapper.desc: If your Human Battery targets have Ether, it will drain their Ether to help pay for your Mantras. 10s Cd

catalytic_strike.name: Catalytic Strike
catalytic_strike.desc: Posture breaking an enemy will Overload their Surge stacks.

human_battery.name: Human Battery
human_battery.desc: When you're out of Ether, convert the Surge stacks of nearby enemies into Ether to pay the cost of your Mantras.

fried_circuits.name: Fried Circuits
fried_circuits.desc: Overloading an enemy applies Sapped for 5s.

surge_path_unstable_capacitor.name: Surge Path: Unstable Capacitor
surge_path_unstable_capacitor.desc: Your lightning no longer applies Shock, instead applying Surge. At maximum statics of Surge, your opponents will Overload, sending arcs of lightning in every direction.

flashboil.name: Flashboil
flashboil.desc: Landing Ice/Fire attacks on burning/chilled enemies extinquishes the flame and generates steam.

boiling_point.name: Boiling Point
boiling_point.desc: Using a fire mantra near your own steam detonates it.

spinning_swordsman.name: Spinning Swordsman
spinning_swordsman.desc: Running attacks do 15% extra damage when you have a speed boost.

blade_dancer.name: Blade Dancer
blade_dancer.desc: Landing a Basic Attack removes your roll cooldown.

bear_trap.name: Bear Trap
bear_trap.desc: Landing a hit with your critical makes your opponent unable to jump for a duration. Also slows your opponent.

action_surge.name: Action Surge
action_surge.desc: Adrenaline Surge now increases your swing speed by 0.04s for its duration.

cut_to_the_chase.name: Cut to the Chase
cut_to_the_chase.desc: You can now 'Aerial Attack' to catch enemies who have recently jumped in the air above you as an anti-air attack with reduced Light Attack damage. Upon hitting the opponent briefly hinder them.

speed_demon.name: Speed Demon
speed_demon.desc:
Your attacks now inflict a reduced-strength bleed while you have a speed boost. 1s cooldown.
[Normal bleed is 15%, this is 7.5%.]

shaper_mimicry.name: Shaper Mimicry
shaper_mimicry.desc: The servants you have conjured will imitate your actions when you Swing/Block/Parry/Jump.

oath_visionshaper.name: Oath: Visionshaper
oath_visionshaper.desc: You vow to only see that which you wish to see. Reality itself is malleable, pliable to your deft hands.

cheap_trick.name: Cheap Trick
cheap_trick.desc: When hit below half health briefly disappear leaving behind an illusion clone to keep your opponent occupied. Briefly disappear after knocking an enemy.

reality_shift.name: Reality Shift
reality_shift.desc: Command the closest conjured servant to attack their hallucinating target, using either a Critical Attack or a Mantra.

propagandist.name: Propagandist
propagandist.desc: Your Sing will now stir your allies into a frenzy, causing them to become Overcharmed for 15s, applying Charmed to enemies they hit with basic attacks.

encore.name: Encore
encore.desc: Your Sing now stun opponents who are already charmed.

vow_of_mastery.name: Vow of Mastery
vow_of_mastery.desc: The Vow of Mastery grants the Master the power to command their Subject. To initiate a vow, you must ask the other player if they'd like to make the vow.e.g."wanna make a vow of mastery?"

command_live.name: Command: Live
command_live.desc:
Once per hour, command a servant to defy all odds and obey your command - live.
[*The cooldown for this Talent scales on your Charisma investment.]

command_summon.name: Command: Summon
command_summon.desc: Command your servant to obey your master and appear before you no matter the distance.

chronostasis.name: Chronostasis
chronostasis.desc: Landing a Basic Attack or Critical Strike now puts target's resonance on cooldown for a short duration.

engage.name: Engage
engage.desc: Landing a Basic Attack slightly restores some of your Ether.

critical_attack.name: Critical Attack
critical_attack.desc: Landing a hit with your critical restores 30% Posture.

conditioned_swimmer.name: Conditioned Swimmer
conditioned_swimmer.desc: You lose less hunger and thirst while swimming.

warriors_swing.name: Warrior's Swing
warriors_swing.desc: Reduces incoming damage if hit during Heavy swing hyper armor.

mercy_kill.name: Mercy Kill
mercy_kill.desc: When you flourish an enemy much weaker than you, you kill them instantly. Enemies that are greatly weaker than you die instantly from a single hit.

switchblade_med.name: Switchblade [MED]
switchblade_med.desc: You can now utilise Dagger talents when not wielding a dagger.

switchblade_hvy.name: Switchblade [HVY]
switchblade_hvy.desc: You can now utilise Dagger talents when not wielding a dagger.

matador.name: Matador
matador.desc: Deal +20% more damage to human enemies with hyperarmor.

showstopper.name: Showstopper
showstopper.desc: When an enemy would roll through one of your physical attacks, stomp the ground, dazing anyone nearby. Removes speed buffs from target upon landing.

brutal_momentum.name: Brutal Momentum
brutal_momentum.desc: [Heavy Weapons] Successfully dodging will give you hyperarmour on your next swing.

cruel_counter.name: Cruel Counter
cruel_counter.desc: When using your initial charge up critical on your Krulian Knife, if you interrupt someone's attack with it apply Cruel Counter on them, massively increasing the damage they take from your critical attacks.

belief.name: Belief
belief.desc: Your medium weapon mantras now deal extra damage based on how much Willpower you have.

battle_frenzy.name: Battle Frenzy
battle_frenzy.desc: The grip on your weapon tightens, reduce the posture of all mantras you block with this effect scaling with the number of combat tags you have on your character.

rosens_technique.name: Rosen's Technique
rosens_technique.desc: If you use Tactical Reload, Rosen's Peacemaker has 30 seconds less off its cooldown.

bulwark_breaker.name: Bulwark Breaker
bulwark_breaker.desc: Increase the size of your Pressure Blast, with the last hit of it dealing increased posture damage.

assassins_strike.name: Assassin's Strike
assassins_strike.desc: Your Rapid Slashes now deals twice the amount of damage.

curved_edge.name: Curved Edge
curved_edge.desc: Your light weapon mantras now gain 30% more chip.

vital_wound.name: Vital Wound
vital_wound.desc: Uppercutting your opponent punctures their lungs, slowing their rate of posture recovery for 10 seconds.

sovereigns_counter.name: Sovereign's Counter
sovereigns_counter.desc: Improve the efficiency of every counter you use. This effect becomes stronger for Punishment if you have the Riot Breaker talent.

punishing_riposte.name: Punishing Riposte
punishing_riposte.desc: When parrying a guardbreak, enhance your critical for the next 4 seconds. If you land your crit on your opponent's block while it is enhanced, immediately guardbreak your opponent.

swift_strike.name: Swift Strike
swift_strike.desc: Hitting your opponent's back with an M1 will enhance your nextc ritical, turning into a teleport backstab that procs all assassination Talents. Doesn't go away until you cast your critical. 20s CD.

blitz.name: Blitz
blitz.desc: Increase how quick you release your Prominence Draw.

bloodthirsty.name: Bloodthirsty
bloodthirsty.desc: Recover health on hit. When landing a critical, deal 30 bleed damage over 5 seconds.

finishing_slay.name: Finishing Slay
finishing_slay.desc: If you land a critical attack while also having stacks from the Chain of Perfection talent, consume all those for a massive damaging attack. This works on other players as well.

expeditious_combo.name: Expeditious Combo
expeditious_combo.desc: Landing an uppercut will grant you a buff to your Onslaught for 15 seconds, using Onslaught during this time will massively increase the speed of it.

haunted_gale.name: Haunted Gale
haunted_gale.desc: Landing 3 Galebreathe Mantras without whiffing calls forth a Haunted Phantom. The Phantom will attack alongside you for the next 8s before dissipating.

ash_ember_lht.name: Ash Ember [LHT]
ash_ember_lht.desc: The more wither your opponent has the more damage your burn deals.

ash_ember_med.name: Ash Ember [MED]
ash_ember_med.desc: The more wither your opponent has the more damage your burn deals.

scorching_decay_lht.name: Scorching Decay [LHT]
scorching_decay_lht.desc: The wither dealt from your Emperor's Flame is massively increased.

ash_ember_hvy.name: Ash Ember [HVY]
ash_ember_hvy.desc: The more wither your opponent has the more damage your burn deals.

scorching_decay_med.name: Scorching Decay [MED]
scorching_decay_med.desc: The wither dealt from your Emperor's Flame is massively increased.

scorching_decay_hvy.name: Scorching Decay [HVY]
scorching_decay_hvy.desc: The wither dealt from your Emperor's Flame is massively increased.
